entries.name: Design Specialization
entries.description: When the android is created, it gains one of six possible designs suited for its role (choose or roll a d6): 1, aerialist; 2, diplomat; 3, diver; 4, duelist; 5, medic; 6, sentry. This design determines certain traits in this stat block.

entries.name: Lightning Overload
entries.description: When the android takes lightning damage, it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (10) or have the stunned condition until the start of its next turn.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The android makes two Force Strike attacks.

entries.name: Force Strike
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close or range Far, one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) force damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (15) or have the prone condition.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Diplomat and Medic Only)
entries.description: The android casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:2/day each: Cure Wounds (as a 3rd-level spell; medic only), Identify, Tongues (diplomat only)

entries.name: Rising Anger
entries.description: If another creature deals damage to the sorrowsworn, the sorrowsworn's attack rolls have advantage until the end of its next turn, and the first time it hits with a Hook attack on its next turn, the attack's target takes an extra 19 (3d12) psychic damage.On its turn, the sorrowsworn has disadvantage on attack rolls if no other creature has dealt damage to it since the end of its last turn.

entries.name: Two Heads
entries.description: The sorrowsworn has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The sorrowsworn makes two Hook attacks.

entries.name: Hook
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The anhkolox doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The anhkolox makes two Claw attacks and one Entrapping Rend attack.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (18) or be pushed up to Close in a horizontal direction of the anhkolox's choice.

entries.name: Entrapping Rend
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 23 (5d6 + 6) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (18) or be trapped in the anhkolox's rib cage and grappled (escape Difficulty (18)). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the anhkolox can't use Entrapping Rend on another target.

entries.name: Animal Lordship
entries.description: An animal lord represents a Forager, Hunter, or Sage (DM's choice), which determines certain traits in this stat block.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries.description: If the animal lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Lordly Presence
entries.description: Presence Reaction Roll (20), any enemy that starts its turn in a Close Emanation originating from the animal lord. Failure: The target suffers one of the following effects:Captivated (Forager Only). The target has the Charmed condition until the end of its next turn. While Charmed, the target has the Incapacitated condition.Fearful (Hunter Only). The target has the Frightened condition until the end of its next turn.Mired (Sage Only). The target takes 10 (3d6) Psychic damage, and the target is magically bewildered until the end of its next turn. While bewildered, the target subtracts 1d4 from its saving throws.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The animal lord has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The animal lord makes two attacks, using Rend or Radiant Ray in any combination, and uses Animal Spirit.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +13, reach Very Close. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Force damage.

entries.name: Radiant Ray
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +12, range Very Far. Hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) Radiant damage.

entries.name: Animal Spirit
entries.description: The animal lord conjures an animal spirit that strikes at a creature and then disappears. Agility Reaction Roll (20), one creature the animal lord can see within Very Far. Failure: 28 (4d10 + 6) Radiant damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: One of the following effects occurs:Fortify (Forager Only). The animal lord gains 20 Temporary Hit Points.Marked as Prey (Hunter Only). The animal lord has Advantage on attack rolls against the target until the start of the animal lord's next turn.Pesky Swarm (Sage Only). The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The animal lord casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (20)):At will: Animal Friendship, Animal Messenger, Speak with Animals2/day each: Awaken, Greater Restoration1/day each: Animal Shapes, Sunburst

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The armor makes two Slam attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries.description: The drone is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the drone must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the drone remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of drone.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The drone makes two melee attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Detention Orb
entries.description: The drone launches a tiny orb of magical force at a creature it can see within Close of itself. The creature must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (15) or be encased in the orb, which expands to a size just large enough to contain the creature. While encased, the creature doesn't need to breathe, eat, or drink, and it doesn't age. Nothing can pass through the orb, nor can any creature teleport or use planar travel to enter or exit the orb. As a bonus action, the drone can move the orb and its contents up to Close in any direction. A successful casting of the Dispel Magic spell on the orb (Difficulty (15)) destroys it. The orb otherwise remains intact until the drone spends an action to end the effect or the drone is destroyed. A drone can have only one detention orb active at a time; if the drone creates a detention orb when it already has one active, the first orb disappears, freeing the creature inside.

entries.name: Magic Bolt
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 16 (3d10) fire damage

entries.name: Chromatic Form
entries.description: When created, the animated breath takes one of five forms, matching its creator's breath weapon: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. This form determines the creature's AC, damage resistance, traits, and attacks.

entries.name: Fire Aura (Fire Form Only)
entries.description: At the start of each of the animated breath's turns, each creature within Very Close of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the animated breath or hits it with a melee attack takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.

entries.name: Putrid Aura (Acid and Poison Forms Only)
entries.description: A creature that starts its turn within Very Close of the animated breath must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (15) or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. A creature that touches the animated breath or hits it with a melee attack takes 3 (1d6) acid damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The animated breath makes two Slam attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) damage of a type determined by the animated breath's form: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.

entries.name: Flyby
entries.description: The broom doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: False Object
entries.description: If the library is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the library move or act, that creature must succeed on a Difficulty (15) Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the library is animate.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The library makes two attacks.

entries.name: Chained Book
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (12)).

entries.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries.description: The statue is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the statue must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The statue makes two melee attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Slash
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries.description: The statue has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The statue has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the statue's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The statue makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

entries.name: Beak
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Talons
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

entries.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries.description: The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the sword must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

entries.name: Halberd
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (11), taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries.description: The knife is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the knife must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the knife remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal knife.

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

name: Animated Object

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach Very Close. Hit: Force damage equal to 1d4 + 3, 2d6 + 3 + your spellcasting ability modifier (Large), or 2d12 + 3 + your spellcasting ability modifier (Huge).

original_cr: None (XP 0; PB equals your Proficiency Bonus)

entries.name: Smother
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the rug can give it the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (13)) instead of dealing damage. Until the grapple ends, the target has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, is suffocating, and takes 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The rug can smother only one creature at a time.While grappling the target, the rug can't take this action, the rug halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

entries.name: Wielder Domination
entries.description: A creature can grab the staff out of the air with a successful grapple check against the staff, and grappling the staff does not reduce the creature's speed. Any creature that successfully grapples the staff must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (12) or be charmed by the staff until the staff is no longer in its grasp. While the creature is charmed, the staff can issue commands to it, which the creature does its best to obey. The creature can repeat the saving throw each time it takes damage, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that successfully resists the staff's control can't be charmed by it for 24 hours.A creature holding the staff that isn't charmed by it can use an action to attempt to break the staff over a knee or against a solid surface, doing so with a successful Difficulty (17) Strength (Athletics) check. Breaking the staff in this manner destroys it.

entries.name: Staff of Frost
entries.description: The staff has 10 charges. It can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells (save Difficulty (12)): cone of cold (5 charges), fog cloud (1 charge), ice storm (4 charges), or wall of ice (4 charges). It regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If the staff expends its last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff turns to water and is destroyed.

entries.name: Staff
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage plus 1 cold damage.

entries.name: Immutable Form
entries.description: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The statue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Magic Weapons
entries.description: The statue's weapon attacks are magical.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: The statue can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The statue makes two slam attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Slow (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The statue targets one or more creatures it can see within Very Close of it. Each target must make a Presence Reaction Roll (17) against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Belch Fire (Recharge 4–6)
entries.description: The stove belches fire in a Close cone. Each creature in the area must make a Agility Reaction Roll (10), taking 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries.description: The table is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the table must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

entries.name: Charge
entries.description: If the table moves at least Close straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (15) or be knocked prone.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the table remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal table.

entries.name: Ram
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Rejuvenation
entries.description: If destroyed, the tile creature regains all its hit points and becomes active again in 24 hours unless at least half its tiles are collected and kept separate from the rest of the creature's tiles.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws. When its fire breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite or horns.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Horns
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Claws
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The dragon head exhales fire in a Close cone. Each creature in that area must make a Agility Reaction Roll (15), taking 31 (7d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries.description: The tree deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tree makes two slam attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Rock
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
entries.description: The tree magically animates one or two trees it can see within Far of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the tree. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the tree dies or is more than Very Far from the tree; or until the tree takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

entries.name: Animated
entries.description: If the wand lacks legs or other appendages it can use for locomotion, it instead has a flying speed of Close and can hover. If the wand is securely attached to a surface or larger wand, such as a chain bolted to a wall, its speed is 0.When the animated wand drops to 0 hit points, it reverts to its original wand form, and any remaining damage carries over to its original wand form.The DM might rule that a specific wands slam attack inflicts slashing or piercing damage based on its form.

entries.name: Wand of Wonder
entries.description: The animated wand can expend 1 of its charges and target a random creature with one of its randomly determined effects. Any such effect that would target the wand's user targets the wand instead. If reduced to 0 hit points, the wand crumbles into dust and is destroyed.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Pounce
entries.description: If the animatronic allosaurus moves at least Close straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (13) or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the animatronic allosaurus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Tunneler
entries.description: The ankheg can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a Very Close-diameter tunnel in its wake.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5 (with Advantage if the target is Grappled by the ankheg), reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (13)).

entries.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
entries.description: Agility Reaction Roll (12), each creature in a Close-long, Very Close-wide Line. Failure: 14 (4d6) Acid damage. Success: Half damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The ankylosaurus makes two Tail attacks.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Undead Fortitude
entries.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (14) or be knocked prone.

name: Annis Hag

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The annis makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

entries.name: Crushing Hug
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (15)) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the hag's turns. The hag can't make attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The hag casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (13)):3/day each: disguise self (including the form of a Medium Humanoid), Fog cloud

original_cr: 6 (XP 2,300, or 3,900 when part of a coven; PB +3)

entries.name: Keen Sight
entries.description: The raptor has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

entries.name: Recorded Mimicry
entries.description: The raptor can mimic any sound, including voices, it has heard in the last 24 hours. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Difficulty (12) Wisdom (Insight) check.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The raptor makes two attacks with its beak.

entries.name: Beak
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The ape makes two Fist attacks.

entries.name: Fist
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Rock (Recharge 6)
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries.description: If Aphemia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: Aphemia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Aphemia makes two attacks: one with her bite and one with her claws.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

entries.name: Claws
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Discordant Song
entries.description: Aphemia shrieks a cacophony of magical sounds. Each humanoid within Very Far of her must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (14) or be frightened of her until the song ends. A frightened creature takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage at the start of its turn while Aphemia is singing. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Aphemia's Discordant Song for the next 24 hours. Aphemia must take a bonus action on her subsequent turns to continue singing. She can stop singing at any time. The song ends if Aphemia is incapacitated or dies.

entries.name: Grave Calling Song
entries.description: Aphemia intones a low, growling magical melody. Every undead within Very Far of her must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (14) or fall under her control until the song ends. Aphemia must take a bonus action on her subsequent turns to continue singing, and she can mentally command the undead under her control as part of the same bonus action. She can stop singing at any time. The song ends if Aphemia is incapacitated or dies.

entries.name: Quarterstaff
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Burning Hands (1st-Level Spell; 2/Day)
entries.description: You shoot forth a Close cone of fire. Each creature in that area must make a Agility Reaction Roll (11). A creature takes 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

entries.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: Ranged Spell Attack: +3 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: You cast one of the following wizard spells (spell save Difficulty (11)), using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:At will: minor illusion2/day: grease

entries.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close or range Very Far, one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) force damage.

entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claws
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (10) or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries.description: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Water Breathing
entries.description: The troll can breathe underwater.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Web Walker
entries.description: The aranea ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and it knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

entries.name: Spider Climb (Hybrid or Spider Form Only)
entries.description: The aranea can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The aranea makes two attacks, using Bite, Slam, or Sling in any combination.

entries.name: Bite (Hybrid or Spider Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Sling (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range Close. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The aranea casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (12)):At will: Friends, Silent Image1/day: Hold Person

name: Arasta

entries.name: Armor of Spiders (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: If Arasta is reduced to 0 hit points, she doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, she regains 200 hit points. In addition, Arasta's children immediately swarm over her body to protect her, granting her 100 temporary hit points.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Arasta fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: Arasta has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: Arasta can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Web Walker
entries.description: Arasta ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Arasta makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage, and the target must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (21), taking 32 (5d12) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

entries.name: Claws
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage.

entries.name: Web of Hair (Recharge 4–6)
entries.description: Arasta unleashes her hair in the form of webbing that fills a Close cube next to her. The web is difficult terrain, its area is lightly obscured, and it lasts for 1 minute. Any creature that moves into the web or that starts its turn there must make a Agility Reaction Roll (21). On a failed save, the creature is restrained while in the web. A creature can use an action to make a Difficulty (21) Strength check. On a success, it can free itself or a creature within Very Close of it that is restrained by the web. This webbing is immune to all damage except magical fire. A Very Close cube of the web is destroyed if it takes at least 20 fire damage from a spell or other magical source on a single turn.

original_cr: 21 (XP 33,000, or 66,000 as a mythic encounter; PB +7)

entries.name: Fiendish Restoration
entries.description: If the arcanaloth dies outside Gehenna, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly and revives with all its Hit Points in Gehenna.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The arcanaloth has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Soul Tome
entries.description: The arcanaloth has a magic tome. While holding or carrying the tome, the arcanaloth can use its Banishing Claw action.The tome has AC 17; HP 35; and Immunity to Necrotic, Poison, and Psychic damage. The tome regains all its Hit Points at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points or when the arcanaloth dies. If the tome is destroyed, the arcanaloth can create a new one when it finishes a Short or Long Rest.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The arcanaloth makes three Fiendish Burst attacks. It can replace one attack with a Banishing Claw attack.

entries.name: Fiendish Burst
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close or range Very Far. Hit: 31 (4d12 + 5) Necrotic damage.

entries.name: Banishing Claw (Requires Soul Tome)
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) Slashing damage plus 19 (3d12) Psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. Presence Reaction Roll (17). Failure: The target is trapped in a demiplane inside the Soul Tome. While trapped there, the target has the Incapacitated condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, escaping the tome on a success. When the target escapes, it appears in the space it left or, if that space is occupied, the nearest unoccupied space.If the target fails three of these saves while in the demiplane, it becomes bound to the tome and can escape only if the tome is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The arcanaloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (17)):At will: Alter Self, Detect Magic, Identify, Mage Hand, Prestidigitation1/day each: Contact Other Plane, Detect Thoughts, Dimension Door, Mind Blank

entries.name: Coven Magic
entries.description: While within Close of at least two hag allies, the hag can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (19)): Augury, Find Familiar, Identify, Locate Object, Scrying, or Unseen Servant. The hag must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day, or 5/Day in Lair)
entries.description: If the hag fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The hag has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Spiteful Escape
entries.description: When the hag drops to 0 Hit Points, it dies only if it is within Close of its anathema (a thing the DM chooses as the hag's most hated thing). Otherwise, the hag drops to 1 Hit Point and teleports to a harmless demiplane, and it can't return to the plane it left for 2d6 days. When the hag teleports away, each creature within Far of the space it left is cursed. Until the curse ends, a creature has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws, and the hag knows its location anywhere in the multiverse.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The hag makes two Spectral Claw attacks and uses Crackling Wave.

entries.name: Spectral Claw
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +14, reach Very Close or range Far. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) Force damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Crackling Wave
entries.description: Agility Reaction Roll (22), each creature in a Far Cone. Failure: 32 (5d12) Lightning damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: The target is cursed until the end of the hag's next turn. The target can't take Reactions until the curse ends.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (22)):At will: Detect Thoughts, Dimension Door, Dispel Magic, Hypnotic Pattern2/day each: Mass Suggestion, Modify Memory, Plane Shift

entries.name: Enigmatic Mind
entries.description: The archaic's mind can't be read, creatures can communicate telepathically with the archaic only if it allows, and magic can't determine whether the archaic is lying.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If the archaic fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The archaic doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The archaic makes two Force Strike attacks. It can also use Gravity Shift, if available.

entries.name: Force Strike
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +14 to hit, reach Close or range Very Far, one target. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) force damage, and the target is pulled up to Very Close toward the archaic or pushed Very Close away from it, as the archaic chooses.

entries.name: Gravity Shift (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The archaic reverses gravity for one creature it can see within Far of itself. The creature must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (22) or fall Far upward. If the falling creature encounters a solid object (such as a ceiling) in this fall, it strikes the object just as it would during a downward fall. If the creature reaches the top of the area without striking anything, it hovers there until the start of the archaic's next turn, at which time gravity returns to normal and the creature falls.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The archaic casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (22)):At will: detect magic, divination, sending1/day each: banishment, forcecage

entries.name: Teleport
entries.description: The archaic teleports to an unoccupied space that it can see within Very Far of itself.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The archdruid makes three Staff or Wildfire attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

entries.name: Staff
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6) poison damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The archdruid casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (17)):At will: beast sense, entangle, speak with animals3/day each: animal messenger, dominate beast, faerie fire, tree stride1/day each: commune with nature (as an action), mass cure wounds

entries.name: Wildfire
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 26 (6d6 + 5) fire damage, and the target is blinded until the start of the druid's next turn.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries.description: The archelon can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The archelon makes two Bite attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The archer makes two Shortsword or Longbow attacks.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The archmage has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The archmage makes four Arcane Burst attacks.

entries.name: Arcane Burst
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close or range Very Far. Hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) Force damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The archmage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (17)):At will: Detect Magic, Detect Thoughts, Disguise Self, Invisibility, Light, Mage Armor (included in AC), Mage Hand, Prestidigitation2/day each: Fly, Lightning Bolt (level 7 version)1/day each: Cone of Cold (level 9 version), Mind Blank (cast before combat), Scrying, Teleport

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries.description: The archon's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save Difficulty (17), +9 to hit with spell attacks). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:At will: command, guiding bolt, spare the dying1/day each: crusader's mantle, spirit guardians

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Mount
entries.description: If the archon isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the archon can't be surprised, and both it and its mount have advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

entries.name: Radiant Rebirth (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries.description: If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points, it regains 30 hit points and springs back to its feet with a burst of radiance. Each creature of the archon's choice within Close of it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (16), or the creature takes 13 (3d8) radiant damage and is blinded until the start of the archon's turn.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The archon makes two attacks with its radiant spear.

entries.name: Radiant Spear
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

entries.name: Eye of the Law
entries.description: As a bonus action, the archon can target a creature it can see within Very Far of it and determine which laws that creature has broken in the last 24 hours.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries.description: The archon's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save Difficulty (18), +10 to hit with spell attacks). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:At will: calm emotions, command, compelled duel

entries.name: Mount
entries.description: If the archon isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the archon can't be surprised, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The archon makes two Hammer of Justice attacks.

entries.name: Hammer of Justice
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (18) or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Pacifying Presence
entries.description: Each creature of the archon's choice that the archon can see within Very Far of it must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (18), or else the target drops any weapons it is holding, ends its concentration on any spells or other effects, and becomes charmed by the archon for 1 minute. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the archon's Pacifying Presence for the next 24 hours.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The archpriest makes three Radiant Burst attacks.

entries.name: Radiant Burst
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close or range Far. Hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) Radiant damage.

entries.name: Holy Word (Recharge 4–6)
entries.description: Presence Reaction Roll (17), each enemy in a Close Emanation originating from the archpriest. Failure: 21 (6d6) Radiant damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the end of the archpriest's next turn. Success: Half damage only.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The archpriest casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (17)):At will: Light, Thaumaturgy1/day each: Flame Strike (level 6 version), Greater Restoration, Raise Dead, Zone of Truth

entries.name: Crackling Death
entries.description: When the arclight phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within Close of it must make a Agility Reaction Roll (18), taking 36 (8d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion destroys the phoenix but leaves behind a Tiny, warm egg with a mizzium shell. The egg contains the embryo of a new arclight phoenix. It hatches when it is in the area of a spell that deals lightning damage, or if a creature touches the egg and expends spell slots whose combined levels equal 13 or more. When it hatches, the egg releases a new arclight phoenix that appears in the egg's space.

entries.name: Flyby
entries.description: The arclight phoenix doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Grounded Lightning
entries.description: The first time on a turn that the arclight phoenix touches the ground, it takes 11 (2d10) force damage.

entries.name: Illumination
entries.description: The arclight phoenix sheds bright light in a Close radius and dim light for an additional Close.

entries.name: Lightning Form
entries.description: The arclight phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within Very Close of it takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage. In addition, the arclight phoenix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

entries.name: Arclight Touch
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 27 (6d8) lightning damage, and lightning jumps from the target to one creature of the phoenix's choice that it can see within Close of the target. That second creature must succeed on a Agility Reaction Roll (18) or take 27 (6d8) lightning damage.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The armanite has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The armanite makes one Claw attack, one Hooves attack, and one Serrated Tail attack.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

entries.name: Hooves
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (16) or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Serrated Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

entries.name: Lightning Lance (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The armanite looses a bolt of lightning in a line that is Far long and Very Close wide. Each creature in the line must make a Agility Reaction Roll (15), taking 36 (8d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries.description: The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

entries.name: Pounce
entries.description: If the tiger moves at least Close straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (14) or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the tiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

entries.name: Death Burst
entries.description: When the elemental dies, it explodes in a burst of colored light. Each creature within Very Close of the elemental must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (11) or be blinded for 1 minute. A blinded creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Joyful Flare
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) fire damage.

entries.name: Melancholic Bolt
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range Close, one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) cold damage.

entries.name: Captivating Artistry (1/Day)
entries.description: The elemental targets one creature it can see within Close of itself. The target must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (12) or be charmed for 1 minute. The charmed target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Ash Cloud
entries.description: When the zombie dies, it leaves a cloud of ash that lasts for 5 minutes but does not obscure vision.

entries.name: Undead Fortitude
entries.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries.description: The armor is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the armor must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

entries.name: Ashen Creature
entries.description: When the armor drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The armor makes two melee attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries.description: The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the sword must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

entries.name: Ashen Creature
entries.description: When the sword drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

entries.name: Divine Eminence
entries.description: As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save Difficulty (13), +5 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, spiritual weapon3rd level (2 slots): dispel magic, spirit guardians

entries.name: Mace
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Assassinate
entries.description: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

entries.name: Evasion
entries.description: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

entries.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries.description: The assassin deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within Very Close of an ally of the assassin that isn't incapacitated and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (15), taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Light Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (15), taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save Difficulty (14), +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield2nd level (3 slots): misty step, suggestion3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, fly4th level (3 slots): greater invisibility, ice storm5th level (1 slot): cone of cold

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

entries.name: Ashen Creature
entries.description: When the ashen knight drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

entries.name: Brave
entries.description: The ashen knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The ashen knight makes two melee attacks.

entries.name: Greatsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

entries.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: For 1 minute, the ashen knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within Close of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the ashen knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the ashen knight is incapacitated.

entries.name: Aura of Silence
entries.description: When a creature starts its turn within Close of the ashen rider, the rider can force that creature to make a Presence Reaction Roll (18) if the rider can see it. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature can't speak and is deafened until the start of its next turn.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries.description: The ashen rider's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save Difficulty (18)). The rider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:At will: command, compelled duel1/day each: banishment, blade barrier

entries.name: Mount
entries.description: If the ashen rider isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the ashen rider and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the ashen rider appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying.While mounted and not incapacitated, the ashen rider can't be surprised, and both it and its mount have advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the ashen rider is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The ashen rider makes three attacks with its ashen blade or two attacks with its bolt of ash.

entries.name: Ashen Blade
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 13 (2d12) radiant damage.

entries.name: Bolt of Ash
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +10 to hit, range Very Far, one creature. Hit: 22 (4d10) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the ashen rider's next turn.

entries.name: Ashen Creature
entries.description: When the shambling mound drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

entries.name: Lightning Absorption
entries.description: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (14)), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Engulf
entries.description: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed target is blinded, restrained, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (14) at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

entries.name: Ashen Creature
entries.description: When the veteran drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

entries.name: Ashen Creature
entries.description: When the horse drops to 0 hit points, it is reduced to a pile of ash, and any equipment it was wearing or carrying falls to the ground.

entries.name: Trampling Charge
entries.description: If the horse moves at least Close straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (14) or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

entries.name: Hooves
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

name: Aspect of Bahamut

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries.description: If the aspect fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Platinum Brilliance (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: If the aspect would be reduced to 0 hit points, his current hit point total instead resets to 500 hit points, he recharges his Breath Weapon, and he regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the aspect can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 155,000 XP (310,000 XP total) for defeating the aspect of Bahamut after his Platinum Brilliance activates.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The aspect makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, and one Tail attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 23 (2d12 + 10) piercing damage plus 22 (4d10) force damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (20)) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The aspect can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 23 (2d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (27) or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The aspect uses one of the following breath weapons:Exalting Breath. The aspect exhales the restoring winds of Mount Celestia in a Very Far cone. Each creature in that area of the aspect's choice regains 71 (13d10) hit points, and each creature in that area of the aspect's choice that has been dead for no longer than 1 hour is restored to life with all its hit points.Platinum Breath. The aspect exhales radiant platinum flames in a Very Far cone. Each creature in that area must make a Agility Reaction Roll (26), taking 66 (12d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

original_cr: 30 (XP 155,000, or 310,000 as a mythic encounter; PB +9)

name: Aspect of Tiamat

entries.name: Chromatic Wrath (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: If the aspect would be reduced to 0 hit points, her current hit point total instead resets to 500 hit points, she recharges her Chromatic Flames, and she regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the aspect can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 155,000 XP (310,000 XP total) for defeating the aspect of Tiamat after her Chromatic Wrath activates.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries.description: If the aspect fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The aspect makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, and one Tail attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 23 (2d12 + 10) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) force damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (20)) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The aspect can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +19 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 23 (2d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (27) or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Chromatic Flames (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The aspect exhales multicolored flames in a Very Far cone. Each creature in that area must make a Agility Reaction Roll (27). On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) damage of a type of the aspect's choosing: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

original_cr: 30 (XP 155,000, or 310,000 as a mythic encounter; PB +9)

entries.name: Hunger of the Void
entries.description: When the aspirant is reduced to 0 hit points, its body and everything it is wearing or carrying, except for magic items, are sucked into a void and destroyed. Creatures in a Close-radius sphere centered on the aspirant must make a Strength Reaction Roll (11). On a failed save, a creature takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage and is pulled Very Close straight toward the aspirant's space. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

entries.name: Sinister Devotion
entries.description: The aspirant has advantage on saving throws against the charmed and frightened conditions.

entries.name: Spear
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

entries.name: Evasion
entries.description: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The assassin makes three attacks, using Shortsword or Light Crossbow in any combination.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the assassin's next turn.

entries.name: Light Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range Far. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 21 (6d6) Poison damage.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the assassin vine remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal plant.

entries.name: Constrict
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Close, one creature. Hit: The target takes 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and it is grappled (escape Difficulty (14)). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and it takes 21 (6d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The vine can constrict only one target at a time.

entries.name: Entangling Vines
entries.description: The assassin vine can animate normal vines and roots on the ground in a Close square within Close of it. These plants turn the ground in that area into difficult terrain. A creature in that area when the effect begins must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (13) or be restrained by entangling vines and roots. A creature restrained by the plants can use its action to make a Difficulty (13) Strength (Athletics) check, freeing itself on a successful check. The effect ends after 1 minute or when the assassin vine dies or uses Entangling Vines again.

entries.name: Special Equipment
entries.description: Asteria wears Winged Boots, which grant her a flying speed (included in her statistics). She also carries one half of a pair of Sending Stones; the other half of the pair is held by Euryale.

entries.name: Guardian Aura
entries.description: Whenever a creature of Asteria's choice within Close of her makes a saving throw, Asteria can give the creature advantage on the saving throw (no action required). This trait doesn't function if Asteria has the incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Asteria fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Asteria makes two Radiant Blade attacks and uses Bursting Benediction.

entries.name: Radiant Blade
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

entries.name: Bursting Benediction
entries.description: Asteria causes a burst of magical energy to envelop one creature she can see within Far of herself. The target must make a Agility Reaction Roll (19), taking 40 (9d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Asteria or another creature that she can see within Far of herself then regains 10 hit points.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: Asteria casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (19)):At will: Guidance, Light, Thaumaturgy2/day each: Bless, Freedom of Movement, Greater Restoration, Plane Shift (self only), Protection from Evil and Good, Revivify

entries.name: Illumination
entries.description: While it has at least 1 hit point, the astral blight sheds dim light in a Very Close radius.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The blight doesn't require air or sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The blight makes two Heat-Draining Vine attacks.

entries.name: Heat-Draining Vine
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) radiant damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (13)). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 3 (1d6) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. The blight has two vines, each of which can grapple one creature.

entries.name: Antimagic Cone
entries.description: The dreadnought's eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell, in a Very Far cone. At the start of each of its turns, it decides which way the cone faces. The cone doesn't function while the eye is closed or while the dreadnought is blinded.

entries.name: Astral Entity
entries.description: The dreadnought can't leave the Astral Plane, nor can it be banished or otherwise transported out of that plane.

entries.name: Demiplanar Donjon
entries.description: Anything the dreadnought swallows is transported to a demiplane that can be entered by no other means except a wish spell or the dreadnought's Bite and Donjon Visit. A creature can leave the demiplane only by using magic that enables planar travel, such as the plane shift spell. The demiplane resembles a stone cave roughly 1,Melee in diameter with a ceiling Far high. Like a stomach, it contains the remains of past meals. The dreadnought can't be harmed from within the demiplane. If the dreadnought dies, the demiplane disappears, and everything inside it appears around the dreadnought's corpse. The demiplane is otherwise indestructible.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If the dreadnought fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Sever Silver Cord
entries.description: If the dreadnought scores a critical hit against a creature traveling by means of the astral projection spell, the dreadnought can cut the target's silver cord instead of dealing damage.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The dreadnought doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The dreadnought makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 36 (5d10 + 9) force damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature and this damage reduces it to 0 hit points or it is incapacitated, the dreadnought swallows it. The swallowed target, along with everything it is wearing and carrying, appears in an unoccupied space on the floor of the Demiplanar Donjon.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) force damage.

entries.name: Special Equipment
entries.description: The elf wears a suit of elven chain.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries.description: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the charmed condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The elf doesn't require sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The elf makes two Scimitar attacks and uses Radiant Beam (if available).

entries.name: Scimitar
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

entries.name: Radiant Beam (3/Day)
entries.description: A magical beam of radiance flashes out from the elf's hand in a Very Close-wide, Far-long line. Each creature in the line must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (16), taking 18 (4d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The elf casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:1/day each: fly, mislead, sending

entries.description: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the charmed condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The elf doesn't require sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The elf makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks.

entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The elf casts the following spell, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:2/day: teleport

entries.description: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the charmed condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.

entries.description: The elf doesn't require sleep.

entries.description: The elf makes two Longsword or Radiant Ray attacks.

entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 13 (2d10 + 2) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

entries.name: Radiant Ray
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 22 (4d10) radiant damage.

entries.description: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the charmed condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The elf doesn't require sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The elf makes two Morningstar attacks. It can use Rain of Radiance in place of one of these attacks.

entries.name: Morningstar
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) radiant damage.

entries.name: Rain of Radiance
entries.description: Magical, flame-like radiance rains down on a creature that the elf can see within Far of itself. The target must make a Agility Reaction Roll (16), taking 22 (5d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The elf casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (16)):2/day each: cure wounds (8th-level version), hold person1/day each: divination, sending, word of recall

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries.description: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the charmed condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The elf doesn't require sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The elf makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

entries.name: Avoidance
