entries.description: If the null is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take half as much damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and half as much damage if it fails.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The null makes two Force Dagger attacks.

entries.name: Force Dagger
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) force damage. Hit or Miss: The dagger magically returns to the null's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The atropal has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Negative Energy Aura
entries.description: Creatures within Close of the atropal can't regain hit points, and any creature that starts its turn within Close of the atropal takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. If the atropal is struck by a vorpal sword, the wielder can cut the atropal's umbilical cord instead of dealing damage. If its umbilical cord is cut, the atropal loses this feature.

entries.name: Turn Resistance Aura
entries.description: The atropal and any other undead creature within Close of it has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

entries.name: Touch
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

entries.name: Ray of Cold
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +12 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 21 (6d6) cold damage.

entries.name: Life Drain
entries.description: The atropal targets one creature it can see within Very Far of it. The target must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (19), taking 36 (8d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The atropal regains a number of hit points equal to half the amount of damage dealt.

entries.name: Summon Wraith (Recharge 6)
entries.description: The atropal summons a wraith which materializes within Close of it in an unoccupied space it can see. The wraith obeys its summoner's commands and can't be controlled by any other creature. The Wraith vanishes when it drops to 0 hit points or when its summoner dies.

entries.name: Aura of Command
entries.description: The draconian radiates a commanding presence in a Close-radius sphere centered on itself. A draconian in the aura that can see or hear the aurak can't be charmed and has advantage on saving throws made to avoid or end the frightened condition on itself.

entries.name: Death Throes
entries.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its magical essence lashes out as a ball of lightning at the closest creature within Close of it before arcing out to up to two other creatures within Close of the first. Each creature must make a Agility Reaction Roll (14). On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The draconian makes three Rend or Energy Ray attacks.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) slashing damage.

entries.name: Energy Ray
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage.

entries.name: Noxious Breath (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The draconian exhales a Close cone of noxious gas. Each creature in that area must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (14). On a failed save, the creature takes 21 (6d6) poison damage and gains 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, doesn't gain exhaustion, and is immune to all draconians' Noxious Breath for 24 hours.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The draconian casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (14)):At will: invisibility, mage hand2/day each: dimension door, disguise self, sending1/day: dominate person

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Aurelia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: Aurelia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Aurelia makes three longsword attacks and uses Leadership.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 12 (1d8 + 8) slashing damage, or 13 (1d10 + 8) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 27 (6d8) radiant damage.

entries.name: Leadership
entries.description: Aurelia utters a few inspiring words to one creature she can see within Close of her. If the creature can hear her, it can add a d10 to one attack roll or saving throw it makes before the start of Aurelia's next turn.

entries.name: Warleader's Helix (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +17 to hit, range Far, one creature. Hit: 54 (12d8) radiant damage, and Aurelia can choose another creature she can see within Very Close of the target. The second creature regains 27 (6d8) hit points.

entries.name: Heat Regeneration
entries.description: If the temperature around it is 100 degrees Fahrenheit or higher, Aurnozci regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Aurnozci dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Aurnozci fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: Aurnozci has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Aurnozci makes one Bite attack and two Tail attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 21 (2d12 + 8) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: Aurnozci casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (20)):At will: Detect Magic, Heat Metal (7th-level version)2/day each: Darkness, Dispel Magic, Hold Person

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Mucus Spray (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Aurnozci sprays mucus in a Far cone. Each creature in that cone must make a Agility Reaction Roll (20), taking 42 (12d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Gore
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage. If the aurochs moved at least Close straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (15) or be knocked prone if it is a creature.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The aurumach makes three Manifested Blade or Gleaming Ray attacks.

entries.name: Manifested Blade
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) force damage.

entries.name: Gleaming Ray
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +11 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 24 (3d12 + 5) force damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The aurumach casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (19)):At will: detect magic, detect thoughts1/day each: fly, geas (as an action), slow, suggestion

entries.name: Tunneler
entries.description: The aurumvorax can burrow through solid rock and metal at half its burrowing speed and leaves a Very Close-diameter tunnel in its wake.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The aurumvorax makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature wearing armor of any type, the aurumvorax regains 4 (1d6 + 1) hit points.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (12)). Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can't use its Claw attack on another target, and when it moves, it can drag the grappled creature with it, without the aurumvorax's speed being halved.

entries.name: Pack Leader
entries.description: The aurumvorax's allies have advantage on attack rolls while within Very Close of the aurumvorax, provided it isn't incapacitated.

entries.name: Tunneler
entries.description: The aurumvorax can burrow through solid rock and metal at half its burrowing speed and leaves a Very Close-diameter tunnel in its wake.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The aurumvorax makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature wearing armor of any type, the aurumvorax gains one of the following benefits of its choice:

entries.name: Frenzy
entries.description: The aurumvorax has advantage on attack rolls until start of its next turn.

entries.name: Invigorate
entries.description: The aurumvorax regains 6 (1d8 + 2) hit points.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (14)). Until this grapple ends, the aurumvorax can't use its Claw attack on another target, and when it moves, it can drag the grappled creature with it, without the aurumvorax's speed being halved.

entries.name: Malfunction
entries.description: Whenever the autognome takes 15 damage or more from a single source and isn't reduced to 0 hit points by that damage, roll a d20 to determine if it suffers a malfunction:1-10: "All Fine Here!" No malfunction occurs.11-12: "My Mind Is Going. I Can Feel It." The autognome is incapacitated for 1 minute.13-14: "You've Disarmed Me!" One of the autognome's arms falls off, reducing the number of Shock attacks it can make by 1 until a creature uses an action to reattach the arm.15-16: "Who Turned Out the Lights?" The autognome's head falls off and deactivates, causing the autognome to be blinded and deafened until a creature uses an action to reattach the head, which reactivates it.17-20: "Have a Magical Day!" The autognome explodes and is destroyed. Each creature within Close of the exploding autognome must make a Agility Reaction Roll (11), taking 22 (4d10) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.Unusual Nature. The autognome doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The autognome makes two Shock attacks.

entries.name: Shock
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close or range Far, one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) lightning damage.

entries.name: Enchanting Presence
entries.description: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within Far of the eladrin must make a Presence Reaction Roll (16). On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, the charmed creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (16)):At will: hold person2/day each: cure wounds (as a 5th-level spell), lesser restoration1/day each: greater restoration, revivify

entries.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries.description: The avatar can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The avatar makes a number of Reaping Scythe attacks equal to half the summoner's Proficiency Bonus (rounded up).

entries.name: Reaping Scythe
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: Automatic hit, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

entries.name: Dive Attack
entries.description: If the avoral is flying, dives at least Close in a straight line toward a Medium or smaller creature, and ends within Very Close of it, that creature must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (15) or take 14 (4d6) piercing damage and have the prone condition.

entries.name: Flyby
entries.description: The avoral doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The avoral makes two Talon attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The avoral casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (16)):1/day each: command, hold person

entries.name: Talon
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) radiant damage.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries.description: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claws
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Charge
entries.description: If the elk moves at least Close straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (13) or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Ram
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Hooves
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one prone creature. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Sting
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (11), taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries.description: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

entries.name: Rake
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +1, reach Very Close. Hit: 1 Slashing damage.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Charge
entries.description: If the moose moves at least Close straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (14) or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Sure-Footed
entries.description: The moose has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The moose makes two attacks: one with its antlers and one with its hooves.

entries.name: Antlers
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Hooves
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal zurkhwood mushroom.

entries.name: Mute
entries.description: If the awakened zurkhwood was created by a myconid sovereign, it can't speak.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Beak
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries.description: The axe of mirabar soldier has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The soldier makes two battleaxe attacks. If it has a handaxe drawn, it can also make a handaxe attack.

entries.name: Battleaxe
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Handaxe
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

entries.name: Fire Aura
entries.description: At the end of each of the azer's turns, each creature of the azer's choice in a Very Close Emanation originating from the azer takes 11 (2d10) Fire damage unless the azer has the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Illumination
entries.description: The azer sheds Bright Light in a Very Close radius and Dim Light for an additional Very Close.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The azer makes two Flame Burst attacks.

entries.name: Flame Burst
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close or range Very Far. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Fire damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The azer casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: Elementalism, Mage Hand1/day: Fireball

entries.name: Fire Aura
entries.description: At the end of each of the azer's turns, each creature of the azer's choice in a Very Close Emanation originating from the azer takes 5 (1d10) Fire damage unless the azer has the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Illumination
entries.description: The azer sheds Bright Light in a Very Close radius and Dim Light for an additional Very Close.

entries.name: Burning Hammer
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The b'rohg makes four Fist attacks or two Rock attacks.

entries.name: Fist
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Rock
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Hideous Rend
entries.description: The b'rohg uses all four of its hands to target one Large or smaller creature it can see within Very Close of itself. The target must succeed on a Agility Reaction Roll (16) or be grappled (escape Difficulty (16)). Until this grapple ends, the b'rohg can't make Fist attacks or Rock attacks, and the target takes 49 (8d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is ripped into four pieces.

entries.name: Controlled Fall
entries.description: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to Far from the fall when calculating the fall's damage.

entries.name: Death Throes
entries.description: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its body turns to stone and releases a petrifying gas. Each creature within Very Close of the draconian must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (11) or be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends; otherwise the creature is petrified for 1 minute. After 1 minute, the body of the draconian crumbles to dust.

entries.name: Draconic Devotion
entries.description: While the draconian can see a Dragon that isn't hostile to it, the draconian has advantage on attack rolls.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The draconian makes two Shortsword attacks.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The babau makes two Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting or Weakening Gaze.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The babau casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (11)):At will: darkness, dispel magic, fear, heat metal, levitate

entries.name: Weakening Gaze
entries.description: The babau targets one creature that it can see within Close of it. The target must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (13). On a failed save, the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The baboon has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the baboon's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +1, reach Very Close. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach Very Close. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

entries.name: Dread
entries.description: Any creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within Very Close of Bael must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (22) or be frightened of him until the start of its next turn. A creature succeeds on this saving throw automatically if Bael wishes it or if he is incapacitated.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Bael fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: Bael have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: Bael regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Bael dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Bael makes two Hellish Morningstar attacks.

entries.name: Hellish Morningstar
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) force damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

entries.name: Infernal Command
entries.description: Each of Bael's allies within Far of him can't be charmed or frightened until the end of his next turn.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: Bael casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (21)):At will: alter self (can become Medium), charm person, detect magic, invisibility, major image3/day each: dispel magic, fly, suggestion, wall of fire1/day: dominate monster

entries.name: Teleport
entries.description: Bael teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to Very Far to an unoccupied space he can see.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries.description: If the baernaloth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The baernaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The baernaloth makes one Anguishing Bite attack and one Claw attack. It can also use Teleport.

entries.name: Anguishing Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the baernaloth's next turn.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) necrotic damage.

entries.name: Miasma of Discord (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The baernaloth exhales gray vapors that coalesce at a point it can see within Very Far of itself. The vapors fill a Close-radius sphere centered on that point, then vanish. Each non-yugoloth creature in that area must make a Presence Reaction Roll (19). On a failed save, the creature takes 35 (10d6) psychic damage and has the charmed condition until the end of its next turn. A creature charmed in this way treats its allies as foes, and the colors of its body and equipment become shades of gray. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The baernaloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (20)):At will: detect thoughts, phantasmal force, suggestion1/day each: cloudkill, plane shift (self only), scrying (as an action)

entries.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Day)
entries.description: The baernaloth has a 50 percent chance of summoning its choice of 1d4 mezzoloths, 1 arcanaloth, or 1 baernaloth (the mezzoloth and arcanaloth appear in the Monster Manual). A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within Far of the baernaloth, acts as an ally of the baernaloth, and can't summon other yugoloths. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the baernaloth dies, or until the baernaloth dismisses it as an action.

entries.name: Teleport
entries.description: The baernaloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to Very Far to an unoccupied space it can see.

entries.name: Amorphous
entries.description: The bag jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The bag jelly makes two Pseudopod attacks.

entries.name: Pseudopod
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) acid damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape Difficulty (11)). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries.description: The bakunawa can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If the bakunawa fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The bakunawa makes one Bite attack and one Storm Slam attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) lightning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (17) or be swallowed by the bakunawa. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, and it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the bakunawa. At the start of each of the bakunawa's turns, each swallowed creature takes 10 (3d6) lightning damage.The bakunawa's gullet can hold up to two creatures at a time. If the bakunawa takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a swallowed creature, the bakunawa must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (16) at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within Close of the bakunawa. If the bakunawa dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using Close of movement, exiting prone.

entries.name: Storm Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) thunder damage, and the target is pushed up to Very Close in a horizontal direction away from the bakunawa.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries.description: If the balhannoth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The balhannoth makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Tentacle
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (15)) and is moved up to Very Close toward the balhannoth. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the balhannoth can't use this tentacle against other targets. The balhannoth has four tentacles.

entries.name: Death Throes
entries.description: The balor explodes when it dies. Agility Reaction Roll (20), each creature in a Close Emanation originating from the balor. Failure: 31 (9d6) Fire damage plus 31 (9d6) Force damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: If the balor dies outside the Abyss, it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

entries.name: Fire Aura
entries.description: At the end of each of the balor's turns, each creature in a Very Close Emanation originating from the balor takes 13 (3d8) Fire damage.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If the balor fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The balor has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The balor makes one Flame Whip attack and one Lightning Blade attack.

entries.name: Flame Whip
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +14, reach Close. Hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) Force damage plus 17 (5d6) Fire damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, the balor pulls the target up to Close straight toward itself, and the target has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Lightning Blade
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +14, reach Very Close. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) Force damage plus 22 (4d10) Lightning damage, and the target can't take Reactions until the start of the balor's next turn.

entries.name: Resonant Connection
entries.description: If the banderhobb has even a tiny piece of a creature or an object in its possession, such as a lock of hair or a splinter of wood, it knows the most direct route to that creature or object if it is within 1 mile of the banderhobb.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The banderhobb makes one Bite attack and one Tongue attack. It can replace one attack with a use of Shadow Step.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (16)) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the banderhobb can't use its Bite attack or Tongue attack on another target.

entries.name: Tongue
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Close, one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and the target must make a Strength Reaction Roll (16). On a failed save, the target is pulled to a space within Very Close of the banderhobb.

entries.name: Shadow Step
entries.description: The banderhobb teleports up to Close to an unoccupied space of dim light or darkness that it can see.

entries.name: Swallow
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one Medium or smaller creature grappled by the banderhobb. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage. The creature is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the banderhobb, and it takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of the banderhobb's turns. A creature reduced to 0 hit points in this way stops taking the necrotic damage and becomes stable.The banderhobb can have only one creature swallowed at a time. While the banderhobb isn't incapacitated, it can regurgitate the creature at any time (no action required) in a space within Very Close of it. The creature exits prone. If the banderhobb dies, it likewise regurgitates a swallowed creature.

entries.name: Scimitar
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach Very Close. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Light Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +3, range Far. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The bandit makes two attacks, using Scimitar and Pistol in any combination.

entries.name: Scimitar
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Pistol
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range Close. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Evasion
entries.description: If the bandit is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the bandit instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The bandit makes three attacks, using Scimitar or Pistol in any combination.

entries.name: Scimitar
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

entries.name: Pistol
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +9, range Close. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) Piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The bandit makes three Dagger attacks.

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close or range Close. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

entries.name: Blinding Flash (Recharge 4–6)
entries.description: Finesse Reaction Roll (14), each creature in a Very Close-radius Sphere centered on a point the bandit can see within Very Far. Failure: 13 (3d6 + 3) Radiant damage, and the target has the Blinded condition until the start of the bandit's next turn. Success: Half damage only.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The bandit casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (14)):At will: Disguise Self, Mage Hand, Minor Illusion1/day each: Hold Person (level 4 version), Mage Armor (included in AC), Major Image

entries.name: Detect Life
entries.description: The banshee magically senses the direction of creatures up to 1 mile away that aren't Constructs or Undead.

entries.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries.description: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The banshee makes two Corrupting Touch attacks and uses Horrify.

entries.name: Corrupting Touch
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Necrotic damage.

entries.name: Horrify
entries.description: Presence Reaction Roll (13), one creature the banshee can see within Far that can see the banshee. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition until the start of the banshee's next turn. Success: The target is immune to this banshee's Horrify for 24 hours.

entries.name: Deathly Wail (1/Day)
entries.description: The banshee releases a mournful wail if it isn't in sunlight. Finesse Reaction Roll (13), each creature within Close that can hear the wail and isn't a Construct or an Undead. Failure: If the target has 25 Hit Points or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points. Otherwise, the target takes 10 (3d6) Psychic damage.

entries.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries.description: Baphomet can perfectly recall any path he has traveled, and he is immune to the maze spell.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Baphomet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: Baphomet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Baphomet makes one Bite attack, one Gore attack, and one Heartcleaver attack. He also uses Frightful Presence.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage.

entries.name: Gore
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 17 (2d6 + 10) piercing damage. If Baphomet moved at least Very Close straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (25) or be pushed up to Very Close away and knocked prone.

entries.name: Heartcleaver
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) force damage.

entries.name: Frightful Presence
entries.description: Each creature of Baphomet's choice within Very Far of him and aware of him must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (18) or become frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. These later saves have disadvantage if Baphomet is within line of sight of the creature.If a creature succeeds on any of these saves or the effect ends on it, the creature is immune to Baphomet's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: Baphomet casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (18)):3/day each: dispel magic, dominate beast, maze, wall of stone1/day: teleport

entries.name: Barbed Hide
entries.description: At the start of each of its turns, the devil deals 5 (1d10) Piercing damage to any creature it is grappling or any creature grappling it.

entries.name: Diabolical Restoration
entries.description: If the devil dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The devil makes one Claws attack and one Tail attack, or it makes two Hurl Flame attacks.

entries.name: Claws
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (13)) from both claws.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Hurl Flame
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range Very Far. Hit: 17 (5d6) Fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it starts burning.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The bard makes two Shortsword or Shortbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Shortbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Cacophony (Recharge 4–6)
entries.description: Each creature in a Close cube originating from the bard must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (12). On a failed save, a creature takes 9 (2d8) thunder damage and is pushed up to Very Close away from the bard. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The bard casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (12)):At will: dancing lights, mage hand, prestidigitation1/day each: charm person, invisibility, sleep

entries.name: Fire Banishment
entries.description: When the barghest starts its turn engulfed in flames that are at least Very Close high or wide, it must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (15) or be instantly banished to Gehenna

entries.name: Soul Feeding
entries.description: The barghest can feed on the corpse of a Fey or Humanoid it killed within the past 10 minutes. This feeding takes at least 1 minute, and it destroys the corpse. The victim's soul is trapped in the barghest for 24 hours, after which time it is digested and the person is incapable of being revived. If the barghest dies before the soul is digested, the soul is released. While a soul is trapped in the barghest, any magic that tries to restore the soul to life has a 50 percent chance of failing and being wasted.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The barghest makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The barghest casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (12)):At will: levitate, minor illusion, pass without trace1/day each: charm person, dimension door, suggestion

entries.name: Portal Sense
entries.description: The bariaur can sense the presence of portals within Close of itself, including inactive portals, and instinctively knows the destination of each one. The bariaur knows the distance and direction to the last portal it used as long as they're on the same plane.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The bariaur makes two Barbed Javelin or Shortbow attacks.

entries.name: Barbed Javelin
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, its speed is reduced by Very Close until the start of the bariaur's next turn.

entries.name: Ram
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the bariaur moved at least Close straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (14) or have the prone condition.

entries.name: Shortbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 4 (1d8) piercing damage if the target doesn't have all its hit points.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The bariaur casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:At will: dancing lights, druidcraft1/day each: goodberry, pass without trace, tongues

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: If the barkburr is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the barkburr move or act, that creature must succeed on a Difficulty (18) Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the barkburr is animate.

entries.name: Springing Leap
entries.description: With or without a running start, the barkburr's high jump is up to Close, and its long jump is up to Close. The barkburr's jumps can exceed its speed if its speed isn't 0.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The barkburr makes two Poison Barb attacks and uses Lignify if able.

entries.name: Poison Barb
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage, and the barkburr attaches to the target. While the barkburr is attached, it can't make Poison Barb attacks, and the target has the restrained condition as its body begins to transform into wood.An attached barkburr can detach itself by spending Very Close of its movement on its turn. A creature that can reach the barkburr, including the target, can use its action to detach the barkburr by making a successful Difficulty (13) Strength (Athletics) check.

entries.name: Lignify
entries.description: The barkburr targets the creature it is attached to, and the target must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (13). On a failed save, the target has the petrified condition until freed by the Greater Restoration spell or another effect, except it turns into a tree instead of stone. Any equipment the target is wearing or carrying is absorbed into the tree's bark.

entries.name: Demonic Restoration
entries.description: If the barlgura dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The barlgura makes one Tormenting Bite attack and two Thrash attacks.

entries.name: Tormenting Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) Psychic damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The barlgura casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (13)):2/day each: Disguise Self, Invisibility (self only)1/day each: Entangle, Phantasmal Killer (level 6 version)

entries.name: Thrash
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Pitchfork
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

entries.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries.description: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Light Crossbows
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The witch is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save Difficulty (12), +4 to hit with spell attacks). The witch has the following wizard spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost1st level (4 slots): ray of sickness, sleep, Tasha's hideous laughter2nd level (2 slots): alter self, invisibility

entries.name: Claws (Requires Alter Self)
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage. This attack is magical.

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Stench
entries.description: Any creature that starts its turn within Very Close of the barrowghast must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (16). On a failed save, the creature has the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While poisoned this way, the creature can't regain hit points. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the Stench of all barrowghasts for 24 hours.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The barrowghast makes two Slam attacks. It can replace one Slam attack with a Life Drain attack.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Life Drain
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (16) or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.A Humanoid slain by this attack immediately rises as a zombie (see the Monster Manual). The zombie acts as an ally of the barrowghast but isn't under its control.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4 to hit, reach Very Close. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

entries.name: Flyby
entries.description: The angel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The angel makes two melee attacks. It also uses Battlefield Inspiration.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage. If the target is within Very Close of any of the angel's allies, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) radiant damage.

entries.name: Battlefield Inspiration
entries.description: The angel chooses up to three creatures it can see within Close of it. Until the end of the angel's next turn, each target can add a d4 to its attack rolls and saving throws.

entries.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries.description: The battlehammer dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

entries.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries.description: The dwarf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The dwarf makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

entries.name: Handaxe
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 3 (1d6 + 0) slashing damage.

entries.name: Light Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The devil has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The devil makes one Beard attack and one Infernal Glaive attack.

entries.name: Beard
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the devil's next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can't regain Hit Points.

entries.name: Infernal Glaive
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a creature and doesn't already have an infernal wound, it is subjected to the following effect. Finesse Reaction Roll (12). Failure: The target receives an infernal wound. While wounded, the target loses 5 (1d10) Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within Very Close of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a Difficulty (12) Wisdom (Medicine) check.

entries.name: Divine Immortality
entries.description: If the beast dies, its body dissolves into black goo, and it gains a new body after 1d10 days, reviving with all its Hit Points in a place of Malar's choosing.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If the beast fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The beast has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The beast regains 20 Hit Points at the start of its turn. If the beast takes Radiant damage or damage from a Critical Hit, this trait doesn't function at the start of the beast's next turn. The beast dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Amphibious (Sea Form Only)
entries.description: The beast breathes air and water.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The beast makes three attacks, using Bite or Claws in any combination.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Claws (Land or Sky Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) Slashing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it has the Prone condition.

name: Beast of the Land

entries.name: Primal Bond
entries.description: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

entries.name: Beast's Strike
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach Very Close. Hit: 1d8 + 2 plus your Wisdom modifier Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage (your choice when you summon the beast). If the beast moved at least Close straight toward the target before the hit, the target takes an extra 1d6 damage of the same type, and the target has the Prone condition if it is a Large or smaller creature.

original_cr: None (XP 0; PB equals your Proficiency Bonus)

name: Beast of the Sea

entries.name: Amphibious
entries.description: The beast can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Primal Bond
entries.description: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

entries.name: Beast's Strike
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach Very Close. Hit: 1d6 + 2 plus your Wisdom modifier Bludgeoning or Piercing damage (your choice when you summon the beast), and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC equals your spell save DC).

original_cr: None (XP 0; PB equals your Proficiency Bonus)

name: Beast of the Sky

entries.name: Flyby
entries.description: The beast doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Primal Bond
entries.description: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

entries.name: Beast's Strike
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach Very Close. Hit: 1d4 + 3 plus your Wisdom modifier Slashing damage.

original_cr: None (XP 0; PB equals your Proficiency Bonus)

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The behir makes one Bite attack and uses Constrict.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach Very Close. Hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) Piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) Lightning damage.

entries.name: Constrict
entries.description: Strength Reaction Roll (18), one Large or smaller creature the behir can see within Very Close. Failure: 28 (5d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (16)), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

entries.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Agility Reaction Roll (16), each creature in a Far-long, Very Close-wide Line. Failure: 66 (12d10) Lightning damage. Success: Half damage.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
entries.description: If the beholder fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The beholder uses Eye Rays three times.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach Very Close. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Eye Rays
entries.description: The beholder randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within Very Far of itself (roll 1d10; reroll if the beholder has already used that ray during this turn):1: Charm Ray. Presence Reaction Roll (16). Failure: 13 (3d8) Psychic damage, and the target has the Charmed condition for 1 hour or until it takes damage. Success: Half damage only.2: Paralyzing Ray. Finesse Reaction Roll (16). Failure: The target has the Paralyzed condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.3: Fear Ray. Presence Reaction Roll (16). Failure: 14 (4d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the end of its next turn. Success: Half damage only.4: Slowing Ray. Finesse Reaction Roll (16). Failure: 18 (4d8) Necrotic damage. Until the end of the target's next turn, the target's Speed is halved; the target can't take Reactions; and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. Success: Half damage only.5: Enervation Ray. Finesse Reaction Roll (16). Failure: 13 (3d8) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points. Success: Half damage only.6: Telekinetic Ray. Strength Reaction Roll (16) (the target succeeds automatically if it is Gargantuan). Failure: The beholder moves the target up to Close in any direction. The target has the Restrained condition until the start of the beholder's next turn or until the beholder has the Incapacitated condition. The beholder can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a tool or opening a door or container.7: Sleep Ray. Presence Reaction Roll (16) (the target succeeds automatically if it is a Construct or an Undead). Failure: The target has the Unconscious condition for 1 minute. The condition ends if the target takes damage or a creature within Very Close of it takes an action to wake it.8: Petrification Ray. Finesse Reaction Roll (16). First Failure: The target has the Restrained condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success. Second Failure: The target has the Petrified condition instead of the Restrained condition.9: Disintegration Ray. Agility Reaction Roll (16). Failure: 36 (8d8) Force damage. If the target is a nonmagical object or a creation of magical force, a Very Close Cube of it disintegrates into dust. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: If the target is a creature and this damage reduces it to 0 Hit Points, it disintegrates into dust.10: Death Ray. Agility Reaction Roll (16). Failure: 55 (10d10) Necrotic damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 Hit Points.

entries.name: Undead Fortitude
entries.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (Difficulty (5) plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The zombie uses Eye Rays twice.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 16 (4d6 + 2) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Eye Rays
entries.description: The zombie randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within Very Far of itself (roll 1d4; reroll if the zombie has already used that ray during this turn):1: Paralyzing Ray. Finesse Reaction Roll (14). Failure: The target has the Paralyzed condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.2: Fear Ray. Presence Reaction Roll (14). Failure: 13 (3d8) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the end of its next turn.3: Enervation Ray. Finesse Reaction Roll (14). Failure: 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points. Success: Half damage only.4: Disintegration Ray. Agility Reaction Roll (14). Failure: 27 (5d10) Force damage. If the target is a nonmagical object or a creation of magical force, a Very Close Cube of it disintegrates into dust. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: If the target is a creature and this damage reduces it to 0 Hit Points, it disintegrates into dust.

entries.name: Alien Mind
entries.description: If a creature tries to read Belashyrra's thoughts or deals psychic damage to it, that creature must succeed on a Instinct Reaction Roll (22) or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Eye Thief
entries.description: Belashyrra can see through the eyes of all creatures within Very Far of it. It can use its Eye Ray through any creature within Very Far of it, as though it were in that creature's space.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Belashyrra fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: Belashyrra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: Belashyrra regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Belashyrra dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Teleport
entries.description: As a bonus action, Belashyrra can teleport up to Close to an unoccupied space it can see.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Belashyrra makes two attacks with its claws and uses its Eye Ray once.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage.

entries.name: Eye Ray
entries.description: Belashyrra shoots one of the following magical eye rays of its choice, targeting one creature it can see within Very Far of it:1. Psyche-Reconstruction Ray. The target must make a Presence Reaction Roll (22), taking 49 (9d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, it dies and transforms into a spectator under Belashyrra's control and acts immediately after Belashyrra in the initiative order. The target can't be returned to its original form by any means short of a wish spell.2. Domination Ray. The target must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (22) or be charmed by Belashyrra for 1 minute or until the target takes damage. Belashyrra can issue telepathic commands to the charmed creature (no action required), which it does its best to obey.3. Mind-Weakening Ray. The target must succeed on a Instinct Reaction Roll (22) or take 36 (8d8) psychic damage and be unable to cast spells or activate magic items for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.4. Blinding Ray. The target and each creature within Very Close of it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (22) or take 19 (3d12) radiant damage and be blinded for 1 minute. Until this blindness ends, Belashyrra can see through the blinded creature's eyes. The blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Beledros fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: Beledros doesn't require air, food, or drink.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Beledros makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 14 (1d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12) necrotic damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 12 (1d6 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is knocked prone.

entries.name: Decaying Breath (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Beledros exhales decaying energy in a Far cone. Each creature in that area must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (23), taking 39 (6d12) necrotic damage and 39 (6d12) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that takes damage from the breath can't regain hit points until the start of Beledros's next turn.

entries.name: Miasmal Flow
entries.description: Beledros becomes a swirling cloud of green mist and can move up to half her flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks, then resumes her true form. During this movement, she can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If she moves through a creature, it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (23) or become poisoned until the end of its next turn. If Beledros ends this move inside an object, she takes 5 (1d10) force damage and is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: Beledros casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:1/day each: greater restoration, mass cure wounds, plant growth, revivify, speak with dead

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The berbalang makes one Bite attack and oneClaw attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The berbalang casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:At will: speak with dead1/day: plane shift (self only)

entries.name: Bloodied Frenzy
entries.description: While Bloodied, the berserker has Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

entries.name: Greataxe
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Bloodied Frenzy
entries.description: While Bloodied, the berserker has Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The berserker makes three attacks, using Greataxe or Javelin in any combination.

entries.name: Greataxe
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) Slashing damage, plus 10 (3d6) Thunder damage to the target or another creature within Very Close of the target.

entries.name: Javelin
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close or range Close. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target's Speed decreases by Very Close until the start of the berserker's next turn.

name: Bestial Spirit

entries.name: Flyby (Air Only)
entries.description: The spirit doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Pack Tactics (Land and Water Only)
entries.description: The spirit has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the spirit's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Water Breathing (Water Only)
entries.description: The spirit can breathe only underwater.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The spirit makes a number of Rend attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach Very Close. Hit: 1d8 + 4 + the spell's level Piercing damage.

original_cr: None (XP 0; PB equals your Proficiency Bonus)

name: Bheur Hag

entries.name: Control Weather (1/Day)
entries.description: The hag can cast the control weather spell, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

entries.name: Graystaff Magic
entries.description: The hag carries a graystaff, a magic staff. The hag can use its flying speed only while astride the staff. If the staff is lost or destroyed, the hag must craft another, which takes a year and a day. Only a bheur hag can use a graystaff

entries.name: Ice Walk
entries.description: The hag can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check, and difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost the hag extra moment.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The hag makes two Slam or Frost Shard attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) cold damage.

entries.name: Frost Shard
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 30 (6d8 + 3) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by Very Close until the start of the hag's next turn.

entries.name: Horrific Feast
entries.description: The hag feeds on the corpse of one enemy within reach that died within the past minute. Each creature of the hag's choice that is within Far and able to see the feeding must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (15) or be frightened of the hag for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, a creature is incapacitated, can't understand what others say, can't read, and speaks only in gibberish. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Horrific Feast for the next 24 hours.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: While holding or riding the graystaff, the hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (14)):At will: hold person1/day each: cone of cold, ice storm, wall of ice

original_cr: 7 (XP 2,900, or 5,000 when part of a coven; PB +3)

entries.name: Earth Glide
entries.description: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

entries.name: Stone Camouflage
entries.description: The xorn has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

entries.name: Treasure Sense
entries.description: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within Far of it.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The xorn makes three claw attacks and one bite attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 22 (5d6 + 5) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

entries.name: Bolstering Presence
entries.description: The biomancer magically emanates life-giving energy within Close of itself. Any ally of the biomancer that starts its turn there regains 5 (1d10) hit points.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The biomancer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The biomancer is a 16th-level Simic spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save Difficulty (17), +9 to hit with spell attacks). The biomancer has the following wizard spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): acid splash, light, mending, poison spray, shocking grasp1st level (4 slots): detect magic, grease, shield2nd level (3 slots): alter self, darkvision, enlarge/reduce, hold person3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, dispel magic, haste, protection from energy4th level (3 slots): confusion, conjure minor elementals, polymorph5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, creation, hold monster6th level (1 slot): move earth, wall of ice7th level (1 slot): prismatic spray8th level (1 slot): control weather

entries.name: Scimitar
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

entries.name: Devil's Sight
entries.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The abishai makes one Bite attack and two Scimitar attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

entries.name: Creeping Darkness (Recharge 6)
entries.description: The abishai casts darkness at a point within Very Far of it, requiring no spell components or concentration. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability for this spell. While the spell persists, the abishai can move the area of darkness up to Far as a bonus action.

entries.name: Scimitar
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) force damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The bear makes two Rend attacks.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Acid damage.

entries.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Agility Reaction Roll (11), each creature in a Close-long, Very Close-wide Line. Failure: 22 (5d8) Acid damage. Success: Half damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The guard makes two melee attacks.

entries.name: Morningstar
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save Difficulty (13), +5 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:Cantrips (at will): acid splash, blade ward, light, mending, mold earth1st level (4 slots): earth tremor, expeditious retreat, shield2nd level (3 slots): shatter, spider climb3rd level (2 slots): slow

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The priest makes two melee attacks.

entries.name: Glaive
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage.

entries.name: Aura of Terror
entries.description: When a hostile creature within Very Close of the black gauntlet makes an attack roll or a saving throw, it has disadvantage on the roll. Creatures that are immune to the frightened condition are immune to this trait.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The black gauntlet is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save Difficulty (15), +7 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy1st level (4 slots): bane, bless, cure wounds, guiding bolt (see "Actions" below)2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, hold person, silence3rd level (2 slots): sending, spirit guardians

entries.name: Tactical Discipline
entries.description: The black gauntlet has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The black gauntlet makes two attacks with its mace.

entries.name: Mace
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

entries.name: Guiding Bolt (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range Very Far, one creature. Hit: 14 (4d6) radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of the black gauntlet's next turn has advantage. If the black gauntlet casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

name: Black Greatwyrm

entries.name: Chromatic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 425 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 105,000 XP (210,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Chromatic Awakening activates.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries.description: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

entries.name: Bite
