entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.

entries.name: Rock
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Water Breathing
entries.description: The octopus can breathe only underwater. It can hold its breath for 1 hour outside water.

entries.name: Tentacles
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (13)) from all eight tentacles. While Grappled, the target has the Restrained condition.

entries.name: Flyby
entries.description: The owl doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The owl casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:At will: Detect Evil and Good, Detect Magic1/day: Clairvoyance

entries.name: Talons
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Beast of Burden
entries.description: The ox is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

entries.name: Gore
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage. If the ox moved at least Close straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage, and it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (16) or have the prone condition.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The ram has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Ram
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage. If the ram moved at least Close straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (14) or have the prone condition.

entries.name: Force Bolt
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range Close, one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) force damage.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The rat has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries.description: The raven has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The raven has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the raven's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The raven makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

entries.name: Beak
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Talons
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Camouflage
entries.description: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

entries.name: Tentacles
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (16)). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

entries.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: A Close-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The scorpion makes two Claw attacks and one Sting attack.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (13)) from one of two claws.

entries.name: Sting
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) Poison damage.

entries.name: Water Breathing
entries.description: The eel can breathe only underwater.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Water Breathing
entries.description: The seahorse can breathe only underwater.

entries.name: Ram
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage, or 11 (2d8 + 2) Bludgeoning damage if the seahorse moved 20+ feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit.

entries.name: Water Breathing
entries.description: The shark can breathe only underwater.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The shark makes two Bite attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9 (with Advantage if the target doesn't have all its Hit Points), reach Very Close. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Blood Frenzy
entries.description: The giant shark skeleton has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

entries.name: Evasion
entries.description: If the skeleton is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The skeleton has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Turn Immunity
entries.description: The skeleton is immune to effects that turn undead.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The skeleton makes three scimitar attacks.

entries.name: Scimitar
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

entries.name: Salt Osmosis
entries.description: Whenever the snail starts its turn in contact with a pound or more of salt, it takes 1d4 necrotic damage. Using an action to sprinkle a pound of salt on the snail deals 1d4 necrotic damage to it immediately and another 1d4 necrotic damage to it at the start of its next turn (after which the salt rubs off), provided the snail has not withdrawn into its shell.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Shell Defense
entries.description: The snail withdraws into its shell, gaining a +4 bonus to its AC until it emerges. It can emerge from its shell as a bonus action on its turn.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries.description: The turtle can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Stable
entries.description: Whenever an effect knocks the turtle prone, it can make a Finesse Reaction Roll (10) to avoid being knocked prone. A prone turtle is upside down. To stand up, it must succeed on a Difficulty (10) Dexterity check on its turn and then use all its movement for that turn.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Web Walker
entries.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and it knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage.

entries.name: Web (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Agility Reaction Roll (13), one creature the spider can see within Far. Failure: The target has the Restrained condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage).

entries.name: Water Breathing
entries.description: The squid can breathe only underwater.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The squid makes one Bite attack and one Tentacle attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Tentacle
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Close. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (16)) from one of two tentacles, and the squid can pull the target up to Very Close straight toward itself.

entries.name: Fire Absorption
entries.description: Whenever the giant strider is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to half the fire damage dealt.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Fire Burst (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The giant strider hurls a gout of flame at a point it can see within Far of it. Each creature in a Very Close-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Agility Reaction Roll (12), taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners, and it ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The lizard makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. One attack can be replaced by Swallow.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (15)). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the lizard can't bite another target.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target not grappled by the lizard. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (15) or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Swallow
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one Medium or smaller creature the lizard is grappling. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage. The target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the lizard, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the lizard's turns. The lizard can have only one target swallowed at a time.If the lizard dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using Very Close of movement, exiting prone.

entries.name: Keen Sight
entries.description: The swan has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The swan makes two attacks with its beak.

entries.name: Beak
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Proboscis
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the tick attaches to the target. While attached, the tick can't make Proboscis attacks. The tick can detach itself by spending Very Close of its movement. As an action, a creature within reach of the tick can try to detach the tick, doing so with a successful Difficulty (13) Strength check.

entries.name: Blood Drain
entries.description: The tick deals 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage to one creature it is physically attached to, provided that creature isn't a Construct or an Undead, or 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage if the creature is a Giant. The tick regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries.description: The toad can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Standing Leap
entries.description: The toad's Long Jump is up to Close and its High Jump is up to Very Close with or without a running start.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (12)).

entries.name: Swallow
entries.description: The toad swallows a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. While swallowed, the target isn't Grappled but has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, and it has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad. In addition, the target takes 10 (3d6) Acid damage at the end of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time, and it can't use Bite while it has a swallowed target. If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer Restrained and can escape from the corpse using Very Close of movement, exiting with the Prone condition.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) Poison damage.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The vulture has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Gouge
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries.description: The walrus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The walrus makes two attacks: one with its body flop and one with its tusks.

entries.name: Body Flop
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Tusks
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) piercing damage.

entries.name: Flyby
entries.description: The wasp doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Sting
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The whirlwyrm makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

entries.name: Constrict
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape Difficulty (16)) if the whirlwyrm isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is restrained until this grapple ends.

entries.name: Thunder Breath (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The whirlwyrm exhales a line of thunder that is Close long and Very Close wide. Each creature in that line must make a Agility Reaction Roll (16), taking 66 (12d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Swallow
entries.description: The whirlwyrm makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the whirlwyrm, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the whirlwyrm's turns. A whirlwyrm can have only one creature swallowed at a time.If the whirlwyrm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the whirlwyrm must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (14) at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within Very Close of the whirlwyrm. If the whirlwyrm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using Close of movement, exiting prone.

entries.name: Water Breathing
entries.description: The eel can breathe only underwater.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) Poison damage.

entries.name: Aberrant Ground
entries.description: The ground in a Very Close Emanation originating from the mouther is Difficult Terrain.

entries.name: Gibbering
entries.description: The mouther babbles incoherently while it doesn't have the Incapacitated condition. Presence Reaction Roll (10), any creature that starts its turn within Close of the mouther while it is babbling. Failure: The target rolls 1d8 to determine what it does during the current turn:1-4. The target does nothing.5-6. The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction.7-8. The target makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (2d6) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition. The target dies if it is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack. Its body is then absorbed into the mouther, leaving only equipment behind.

entries.name: Blinding Spittle (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Agility Reaction Roll (10), each creature in a Very Close-radius Sphere centered on a point within Close. Failure: 7 (2d6) Radiant damage, and the target has the Blinded condition until the end of the mouther's next turn.

entries.name: Aversion to Fire
entries.description: If the gibberling takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Incessant Gibberish
entries.description: Any non-gibberling that is within Close of the gibberling and doesn't have the deafened condition has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration on spells and similar effects.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

entries.name: Firearms Knowledge
entries.description: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of muskets and pistols.

entries.name: Headfirst Charge
entries.description: The giff can try to knock a creature over; if the giff moves at least Close in a straight line and ends within Very Close of a Large or smaller creature, that creature must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (14) or take 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The giff makes two Longsword, Musket, or Pistol attacks.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Musket
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Pistol
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Fragmentation Grenade (1/Day)
entries.description: The giff throws a grenade up to Far, and the grenade explodes in a Close-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a Agility Reaction Roll (15), taking 17 (5d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Firearms Knowledge
entries.description: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of any firearm.

entries.name: Steady as She Goes
entries.description: On the deck of a ship, the giff has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone or shove it overboard.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The giff makes two Longsword or Musket attacks.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Musket
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Force Grenade
entries.description: The giff throws a grenade up to Far, and the grenade explodes in a Close-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a Agility Reaction Roll (15), taking 17 (5d6) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After the giff throws the grenade, roll a d6; on a roll of 4 or lower, the giff has no more grenades to throw.

entries.name: Firearms Knowledge
entries.description: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of any firearm.

entries.name: Headfirst Charge
entries.description: If the giff moves at least Close in a straight line and ends within Very Close of a Large or smaller creature, that creature must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (16) or take 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries.description: The giff deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The giff makes two Greatsword or Musket attacks.

entries.name: Greatsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

entries.name: Musket
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 15 (2d12 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Thunder Bomb
entries.description: The giff lights a grapefruit-sized bomb and throws it at a point up to Far away, where it explodes. Each creature within a Very Close-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Agility Reaction Roll (15), taking 18 (4d8) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After the giff throws the bomb, roll a d6; on a roll of 4 or lower, the giff has no more bombs to throw.

entries.name: Firearms Knowledge
entries.description: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of any firearm.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries.description: If the giff fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The giff makes two Morningstar attacks.

entries.name: Morningstar
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

entries.name: Double-Barreled Musket
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 28 (4d12 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Spell-Resistant Carapace
entries.description: The gigant has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature that makes a spell attack against the gigant has disadvantage on the attack roll.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The gigant makes one Mandibles attack and two Talons attacks.

entries.name: Mandibles
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) slashing damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape Difficulty (17)). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 21 (4d6 + 7) slashing damage at the start of each of the gigant's turns. While the gigant is grappling a target, it can't use Mandibles against other targets.

entries.name: Talons
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage, and the target is pulled Very Close straight toward the gigant.

entries.name: Scale Dust (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The gigant releases magical dust from its wings in a Close cube. Each creature in that area must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (19), taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a success or failure, the creature has the poisoned condition for 1 hour. While poisoned this way, the creature can't regain hit points.

entries.name: Alternate Forms
entries.description: The gingwatzim has two alternate forms, both of which are chosen by its creator when the gingwatzim comes into being. One form is an exact duplicate of a Tiny nonmagical object (such as a book, dagger, or gemstone) that its creator is carrying or wearing when the gingwatzim is conjured. The other form can be any Tiny beast. Once these alternate forms are chosen, they can't be changed.

entries.name: Energy Drain (True Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 16 (4d6 + 2) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (12) or gain 1 level of exhaustion. When the target finishes a short or long rest, the target loses every level of exhaustion gained from this attack.

entries.name: Change Shape
entries.description: The gingwatzim changes from its true form—a Melee-diameter sphere of luminous ectoplasm—into one of its two alternate forms, or from one of those forms back into its true form. In object form, it can't move or make attacks but otherwise retains its statistics, and it is indistinguishable from the thing it is imitating. In beast form, it retains its hit points but otherwise uses the stat block of the beast it is imitating. When it dies, the gingwatzim reverts to its true form and then vanishes.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The girallon makes one Bite attack and four Claw attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Aggressive
entries.description: As a bonus action, the zombie can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

entries.name: Undead Fortitude
entries.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The zombie makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The githyanki makes two Greatsword or Telekinetic Bolt attacks.

entries.name: Greatsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (13)):At will: light, mage hand (the hand is invisible)1/day each: plane shift, telekinesis

entries.name: Telekinetic Bolt
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) force damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The githyanki makes three Draconic Strike attacks.

entries.name: Draconic Strike
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +10, reach Very Close or range Very Far. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) Fire damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the start of the githyanki's next turn.

entries.name: Conjured Dragon's Breath (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Agility Reaction Roll (18), each creature in a Far Cone. Failure: 27 (6d8) Fire damage plus 27 (6d8) Force damage. Success: Half damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (18), +10 to hit with spell attacks):At will: Mage Hand (the hand is Invisible)2/day each: Nondetection (self only), Plane Shift, Tongues

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The githyanki makes three Longsword or Telekinetic Bolt attacks, or it makes one of those attacks and uses Spellcasting.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: light, mage hand (the hand is invisible), message3/day each: fireball, invisibility, nondetection (self only)1/day each: dimension door, plane shift, telekinesis

entries.name: Telekinetic Bolt
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 28 (8d6) force damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The githyanki makes three Greatsword attacks.

entries.name: Greatsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) psychic damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)3/day each: blur, nondetection (self only)1/day each: plane shift, telekinesis

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The githyanki makes three Silver Sword attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Telekinesis if available.

entries.name: Silver Sword
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) Psychic damage. Critical Hit: If the target is in an astral body (as with the Astral Projection spell), the githyanki can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body instead of dealing damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (13)):At will: Mage Hand (the hand is Invisible)2/day each: Nondetection (self only), Tongues1/day each: Plane Shift, Telekinesis

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The githyanki makes three Astral Bolt attacks.

entries.name: Astral Bolt
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close or range Far, one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) radiant damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: light, mage hand (the hand is invisible)2/day each: detect magic, invisibility (self only), mage armor (self only), tongues1/day each: contact other plane (as an action), plane shift, telekinesis

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If the githyanki fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The githyanki makes two Silver Greatsword attacks.

entries.name: Silver Greatsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) psychic damage. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the astral projection spell), the githyanki can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (16)):At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)3/day each: levitate (self only), nondetection (self only)1/day each: Bigby's hand, mass suggestion, plane shift, telekinesis

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The githyanki makes two Psi Blade attacks.

entries.name: Psi Blade
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Psychic damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:At will: Mage Hand (the hand is Invisible)2/day: Nondetection (self only)

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The githyanki makes three Staff attacks, three Telekinetic Bolt attacks, or a combination thereof.

entries.name: Staff
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (16)):At will: druidcraft, light, mage hand (the hand is invisible)2/day each: invisibility (self only), pass without trace (self only)1/day each: dominate monster, forcecage, plane shift, telekinesis

entries.name: Telekinetic Bolt
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) force damage.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If the githzerai fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Psychic Defense
entries.description: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage.

entries.name: Temporal Strike (Recharge 6)
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 52 (8d12) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (16) or move 1 round forward in time. A target moved forward in time vanishes for the duration. When the effect ends, the target reappears in the space it left or in an unoccupied space nearest to that space if it's occupied.

entries.name: Psychic Defense
entries.description: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike or Psychic Bolt attacks.

entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

entries.name: Psychic Bolt
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range Far, one creature. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) psychic damage.

entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +8, reach Very Close or range Very Far. Hit: 26 (4d10 + 4) Psychic damage, and the target has the githzerai's choice of (A) the Charmed condition until the start of the githzerai's next turn or (B) the Prone condition, provided the target is a Large or smaller creature.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (16)):At will: Mage Hand (the hand is Invisible)1/day each: Plane Shift, See Invisibility

entries.description: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

entries.name: Psychic Defense

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike or Psychic Bolt attacks. It can replace any of these attacks with one use of its Pacifying Touch.

entries.name: Unarmed Strike
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

entries.name: Psychic Bolt
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range Far, one creature. Hit: 17 (5d6) psychic damage.

entries.name: Pacifying Touch
entries.description: The githzerai touches one creature it can see within Very Close of itself. The target must succeed on a Instinct Reaction Roll (14), or the githzerai chooses an action for that target: Attack, Cast a Spell, or Dash. The affected target can't take that action for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a successful save. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to this githzerai's Pacifying Touch for 24 hours.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (14)):At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible), see invisibility1/day each: plane shift (self only), telekinesis
