If at least three other pechs are within Close of it, the pech can cast Wall of Stone. If at least seven other pechs are within Close of it, it can cast Greater Restoration. Each other pech involved in casting the spell can't have the incapacitated condition and must have at least one use of Communal Spellcasting remaining, which it must immediately expend to participate (no action required).

entries.name: Fortified Pickaxe
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) force damage. If the target is a Construct or an object, the attack is automatically a critical hit.

entries.name: Stone Shape (3/Day)
entries.description: The pech casts Stone Shape, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The pech has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries.description: While in sunlight, the pech has disadvantage on attack rolls.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The pech makes two Fortified Pickaxe attacks. If it hits a Large or smaller creature with both attacks, the target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (14) or have the prone condition.

entries.name: Communal Spellcasting (2/Day)
entries.description: The pech works with three or more pechs to cast spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (save Difficulty (12)). If at least three other pechs are within Close of it, the pech can cast Wall of Stone. If at least seven other pechs are within Close of it, it can cast Greater Restoration. Each other pech involved in casting the spell can't have the incapacitated condition and must have at least one use of Communal Spellcasting remaining, which it must immediately expend to participate (no action required).

entries.name: Fortified Pickaxe
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) force damage. If the target is a Construct or an object, the attack is automatically a critical hit.

entries.name: Stone Shape (3/Day)
entries.description: The pech casts Stone Shape, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

entries.name: Hooves
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) Radiant damage.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The performer makes three Bejeweled Baton attacks.

entries.name: Bejeweled Baton
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Psychic damage.

entries.name: Majestic Song
entries.description: Presence Reaction Roll (17), each creature in a Close-radius Sphere centered on a point within Very Far. Failure: 22 (4d8 + 4) Psychic damage, and the target has the Charmed or Frightened condition (performer's choice) until the end of the performer's next turn. Success: Half damage only.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The performer casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (17)):At will: Mage Hand, Minor Illusion, Prestidigitation1/day each: Major Image, Project Image

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The performer makes three Rapier attacks.

entries.name: Rapier
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Psychic damage.

entries.name: Beguiling Song
entries.description: Presence Reaction Roll (15), each creature in a Close-radius Sphere centered on a point within Very Far. Failure: 20 (3d10 + 4) Psychic damage, and the target has the Charmed condition until the end of the performer's next turn. Success: Half damage only.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The performer casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: Minor Illusion, Prestidigitation1/day: Tasha's Hideous Laughter (level 3 version)

entries.name: Flyby
entries.description: The peryton doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The peryton makes one Gore attack and one Talons attack.

entries.name: Gore
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage. If the peryton moved 30+ feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Talons
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage. If the attack reduces a Humanoid target to 0 Hit Points, the peryton kills the target by removing its heart.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The pest regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If it takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the pest's next turn.

entries.name: Spiny Hide
entries.description: At the start of each of its turns, the pest deals 2 (1d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it or that it is grappling.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The phaerimm has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The phaerimm makes three attacks, using Dread Stinger or Mindwarp Ray in any combination.

entries.name: Dread Stinger
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) Poison damage.

entries.name: Mindwarp Ray
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range Very Far. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Psychic damage, and the target has the Charmed condition until the start of the phaerimm's next turn.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The phaerimm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: Detect Magic, Detect Thoughts, Mage Hand1/day each: Clairvoyance, Major Image, Synaptic Static

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The phaerimm has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The phaerimm makes three Mind Lash attacks. It can replace one attack with either (A) a Vicious Stinger attack or (B) a use of Spellcasting to cast Command (level 3 version).

entries.name: Mind Lash
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close or range Very Far. Hit: 32 (6d8 + 4) Psychic damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The phaerimm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (17)):At will: Command (level 3 version), Detect Magic, Detect Thoughts, Mage Hand1/day each: Clairvoyance, Geas, Major Image, Mirage Arcane

entries.name: Vicious Stinger
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 26 (4d12) Poison damage, and the target's Speed is reduced to Melee until the start of the phaerimm's next turn.

entries.name: Siphon Magic (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The phaerimm focuses on a magic item it can see within Very Close. When it does, the phaerimm drains the magic item of any charges. Regardless of whether charges are drained, the phaerimm can cast Clairvoyance, Geas, Major Image, and Mirage Arcane one additional time that day.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The phaerimm has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The phaerimm makes two Stinger attacks.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The phaerimm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (12)):At will: Detect Thoughts, Mage Hand

entries.name: Stinger
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach Very Close. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The phaerimm has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The phaerimm makes two attacks, using Stinger or Mindwarp Ray in any combination.

entries.name: Stinger
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach Very Close. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) Poison damage.

entries.name: Mindwarp Ray
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range Very Far. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Psychic damage, and the target has the Charmed condition until the start of the phaerimm's next turn.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The phaerimm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (13)):At will: Detect Magic, Detect Thoughts, Mage Hand1/day: Clairvoyance

entries.name: Ethereal Sight
entries.description: The phantom warrior can see Far into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

entries.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries.description: The phantom warrior can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

entries.name: Spectral Armor and Shield
entries.description: The phantom warrior's AC accounts for its spectral armor and shield.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The phantom warrior makes two attacks with its spectral longsword.

entries.name: Spectral Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage.

entries.name: Etherealness
entries.description: The phantom warrior enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

entries.name: Ethereal Sight
entries.description: The phantom warrior can see Far into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

entries.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries.description: The phantom warrior can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

entries.name: Spectral Armor and Shield
entries.description: The phantom warrior's AC accounts for its spectral armor and shield.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The phantom warrior makes two attacks with its spectral longsword or spectral longbow.

entries.name: Spectral Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage.

entries.name: Etherealness
entries.description: The phantom warrior enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

entries.name: Spectral Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) force damage.

entries.name: Ethereal Sight
entries.description: The spider can see Far into the Ethereal Plane while on the Material Plane and vice versa.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Web Walker
entries.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the spider knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The spider makes two Bite attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) Poison damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the target becomes Stable, and it has the Poisoned condition for 1 hour. While Poisoned, the target also has the Paralyzed condition.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The phisarazu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: The phisarazu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Web Sense
entries.description: When in contact with a web, the phisarazu knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

entries.name: Web Walker
entries.description: The phisarazu ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The phisarazu makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Scintillating Spray if available.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target has the poisoned condition until the start of the phisarazu's next turn.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Scintillating Spray (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The phisarazu expels shimmering webs in a Far cone. Creatures and objects in that area are outlined by the glittering webs for 1 minute, during which time they emit dim light for Very Close and can't benefit from the invisible condition. Additionally, creatures in that area must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (16) or have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Fiery Death and Rebirth
entries.description: If the phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature in Far-radius sphere centered on the phoenix must make a Agility Reaction Roll (20), taking 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.The explosion destroys the phoenix's body and leaves behind an egg-shaped cinder, which weighs 5 pounds. The cinder deals 21 (6d6) fire damage to any creature that touches it, though no more than once per round. The cinder is immune to all damage, and after 1d6 days, it hatches a new phoenix.

entries.name: Fire Form
entries.description: The phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.Any creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within Very Close of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. In addition, the phoenix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.With a touch, the phoenix can also ignite flammable objects that aren't worn or carried (no action required).

entries.name: Flyby
entries.description: The phoenix doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Illumination
entries.description: The phoenix sheds bright light in a Far radius and dim light for an additional Close.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If the phoenix fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries.description: The phoenix deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The phoenix makes two attacks: one Beak attack and one Fiery Talons attack.

entries.name: Beak
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) fire damage.

entries.name: Fiery Talons
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) fire damage.

entries.name: Gatekeeper's Aura
entries.description: Any creature that starts its turn within Very Close of the phylaskia must make a Presence Reaction Roll (15). On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage on saving throws and its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

entries.name: Undead Fortitude
entries.description: If damage reduces the phylaskia to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC equal to 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the phylaskia drops to 1 hit point instead.

entries.name: Vigilant
entries.description: The phylaskia can't be surprised.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The phylaskia makes two longsword attacks and uses its Strength Drain once.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.

entries.name: Strength Drain
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) necrotic damage. Unless the target is immune to necrotic damage, its Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: The piercer can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Drop
entries.description: The piercer falls. Agility Reaction Roll (11), one creature directly underneath the piercer. Failure: 10 (3d6) Piercing damage. Failure or Success: The piercer reduces any damage it takes from the fall by 20.

entries.name: Water Breathing
entries.description: The piranha can breathe only underwater.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5 (with Advantage if the target doesn't have all its Hit Points), reach Very Close. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The pirate makes two Dagger attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Enthralling Panache.

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close or range Close. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Enthralling Panache
entries.description: Presence Reaction Roll (12), one creature the pirate can see within Close. Failure: The target has the Charmed condition until the start of the pirate's next turn.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The pirate makes three attacks, using Scimitar or Pistol in any combination.

entries.name: Scimitar
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach Very Close. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage, and the target suffers one of the following effects of the pirate's choice:Awestruck. The target has the Charmed condition until the start of the pirate's next turn.Poison. The target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the pirate's next turn.

entries.name: Pistol
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +10, range Close. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Cargo Hauler
entries.description: The bosun has advantage on Strength checks.

entries.name: Sea Legs
entries.description: The bosun has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked prone.

entries.name: Light Hammer
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Hook
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (13)).

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The pirate makes three attacks, using Rapier or Pistol in any combination.

entries.name: Rapier
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage, and the pirate has Advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

entries.name: Pistol
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range Close. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Sea Legs
entries.description: The deck wizard has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked prone.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The deck wizard is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save Difficulty (13), +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): friends, mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost1st level (4 slots): disguise self, fog cloud, mage armor, witch bolt2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, Melf's acid arrow, misty step

entries.name: Quarterstaff
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Sea Legs
entries.description: The first mate has advantage on ability checks and saving throws to resist being knocked prone.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The first mate makes two attacks with its longsword.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands. If the target is a creature, the first mate can choose to deal no damage with the attack to disarm the target. The target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (14) or drop one item it is holding on the ground.

entries.name: Diabolical Restoration
entries.description: If the pit fiend dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

entries.name: Fear Aura
entries.description: The pit fiend emanates an aura in a Close Emanation while it doesn't have the Incapacitated condition. Presence Reaction Roll (21), any enemy that starts its turn in the aura. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to this pit fiend's aura for 24 hours.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries.description: If the pit fiend fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The pit fiend has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The pit fiend makes one Bite attack, two Devilish Claw attacks, and one Fiery Mace attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +14, reach Very Close. Hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) Piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make the following saving throw. Finesse Reaction Roll (21). Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points and takes 21 (6d6) Poison damage at the start of each of its turns, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

entries.name: Devilish Claw
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +14, reach Very Close. Hit: 26 (4d8 + 8) Necrotic damage.

entries.name: Fiery Mace
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +14, reach Very Close. Hit: 22 (4d6 + 8) Force damage plus 21 (6d6) Fire damage.

entries.name: Hellfire Spellcasting (Recharge 4–6)
entries.description: The pit fiend casts Fireball (level 5 version) twice, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (21)). It can replace one Fireball with Hold Monster (level 7 version) or Wall of Fire.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The pixie has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Faerie Dust
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close or range Far. Hit: 1 Radiant damage, and the target has the Charmed or Poisoned condition (pixie's choice) until the start of the pixie's next turn.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The pixie casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (12)):At will: Dancing Lights, Druidcraft, Invisibility (self only)1/day each: Detect Thoughts, Fly, Sleep

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The pixie has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The pixie makes two Faerie Dust attacks.

entries.name: Faerie Dust
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close or range Far. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Radiant damage, and the target has the Charmed or Poisoned condition (pixie's choice) until the start of the pixie's next turn.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The pixie casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: Dancing Lights, Druidcraft, Invisibility (self only)1/day each: Detect Thoughts, Fly, Major Image

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If the incarnate fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The incarnate has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Planar Form
entries.description: An incarnate on the Upper Planes is a Celestial. An incarnate on the Lower Planes is a Fiend.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries.description: The incarnate deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The incarnate makes two Slam or Energy Bolt attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 27 (3d12 + 8) force damage.

entries.name: Energy Bolt
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +12 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 32 (5d12) necrotic damage if the incarnate is a Fiend or radiant damage if the incarnate is a Celestial.

entries.name: Planar Exhalation (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The incarnate exhales concentrated energy native to its plane in a Far cone. Each creature in that area must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (23). On a failed save, a creature takes 52 (8d12) necrotic damage if the incarnate is a Fiend or radiant damage if the incarnate is a Celestial, and the creature has the blinded condition until the end of the incarnate's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

entries.name: Divine Awareness
entries.description: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

entries.name: Exalted Restoration
entries.description: If the planetar dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The planetar has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The planetar makes three Radiant Sword attacks or uses Holy Burst twice.

entries.name: Radiant Sword
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +12, reach Very Close. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) Radiant damage.

entries.name: Holy Burst
entries.description: Agility Reaction Roll (20), each enemy in a Close-radius Sphere centered on a point the planetar can see within Very Far. Failure: 24 (7d6) Radiant damage. Success: Half damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The planetar casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (20)):At will: Detect Evil and Good1/day each: Commune, Control Weather, Dispel Evil and Good, Raise Dead

entries.name: Amorphous
entries.description: The plasmoid can squeeze through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide, provided it is wearing and carrying nothing. It has advantage on ability checks it makes to initiate or escape a grapple.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries.description: The plasmoid can hold its breath for 1 hour.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The plasmoid makes three Pseudopod attacks.

entries.name: Pseudopod
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit (with advantage if the plasmoid has one or more allies within Very Close of itself), reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Amorphous
entries.description: The plasmoid can squeeze through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide, provided it is wearing and carrying nothing. It has advantage on ability checks it makes to initiate or escape a grapple.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries.description: The plasmoid can hold its breath for 1 hour.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The plasmoid makes two Pseudopod attacks. It can replace one of those attacks with a Javelin attack.

entries.name: Pseudopod
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Javelin
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

entries.name: Amorphous
entries.description: The plasmoid can squeeze through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide, provided it is wearing and carrying nothing. It has advantage on ability checks it makes to initiate or escape a grapple.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries.description: The plasmoid can hold its breath for 1 hour.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The plasmoid makes three Pseudopod attacks. It can replace one of those attacks with a Spear or Pistol attack.

entries.name: Pseudopod
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Spear
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

entries.name: Pistol
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries.description: The plesiosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Semblance of Life
entries.description: The podling is a physical copy of a creature digested by a bodytaker plant. The podling has the digested creature's memories and behaves like that creature, but with occasional lapses. An observer familiar with the digested creature can recognize the discrepancies with a successful Difficulty (20) Wisdom (Insight) check, or automatically if the podling does something in direct contradiction to the digested creature's established beliefs or behavior. The podling melts into a slurry when it dies, when the bodytaker plant that created it dies, or when the bodytaker plant dismisses it (no action required).

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The podling doesn't require sleep.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Brew Bound
entries.description: The weird dies if forced to leave the basin of toxic brew it inhabits, or if a purify food and drink spell is cast on the brew.

entries.name: Invisible in Water
entries.description: The weird is invisible while fully immersed in toxic brew.

entries.name: Poisonous Body
entries.description: A creature takes 10 (3d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns while grappled by a poison weird.

entries.name: Constrict
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (13)) and pulled Very Close toward the poison weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the poison weird tries to drown it, and the poison weird can't constrict another target.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The bear makes two Rend attacks.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Misty Slithering
entries.description: The serpent can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The serpent makes one Bite attack and uses Constrict.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) Cold damage.

entries.name: Constrict
entries.description: Strength Reaction Roll (14), one Medium or smaller creature the snake can see within Very Close. Failure: 3 (1d6) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Cold damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (14)), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

entries.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries.description: The poltergeist can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The poltergeist makes one Object Slam attack and uses Telekinetic Thrust.

entries.name: Object Slam
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close or range Close. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Telekinetic Thrust
entries.description: Strength Reaction Roll (12), one creature the poltergeist can see within Close. Failure: 9 (2d6 + 2) Force damage, and the target is pushed up to Close straight away from the poltergeist.

entries.name: Acidic Blood
entries.description: When Polukranos takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within Very Close of Polukranos takes 10 (3d6) acid damage.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries.description: Polukranos can hold its breath for 1 hour.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Polukranos fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Multiple Heads
entries.description: Polukranos has five heads. While it has more than one head, Polukranos has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious. Whenever Polukranos takes 40 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, Polukranos dies. At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken 40 or more fire damage since its last turn. Polukranos regains 20 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

entries.name: Reactive Heads
entries.description: For each head Polukranos has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only to make opportunity attacks.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries.description: Polukranos deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Wakeful
entries.description: While Polukranos sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Polukranos makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage.

entries.name: Stomp
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (21) or be pushed up to Close away from Polukranos.

entries.name: Hooves
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Rapier
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Light Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range Far. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries.description: The mage's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save Difficulty (14)). It can cast the following spells, requiring no material components:3/day: detect thoughts, mage armor1/day each: clairvoyance, locate object

entries.name: Quarterstaff
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Glimpse the Temporal Flood (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The mage targets one creature within Very Far of it that it can see. The target takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage, and it must succeed on a Instinct Reaction Roll (14) or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The priest makes two attacks, using Mace or Radiant Flame in any combination.

entries.name: Mace
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) Radiant damage.

entries.name: Radiant Flame
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range Far. Hit: 11 (2d10) Radiant damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The priest casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:At will: Light, Thaumaturgy1/day: Spirit Guardians

entries.name: Mace
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) Radiant damage.

entries.name: Radiant Flame
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range Far. Hit: 7 (2d6) Radiant damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The priest casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:At will: Light, Thaumaturgy

entries.name: Tattoo of Osybus
entries.description: If the priest drops to 0 hit points, roll on the Boons of Undeath table for the boon the priest receives. The priest dies if it receives a boon it already has. If it receives a new boon, it revives at the start of its next turn with half its hit points restored, and its creature type is now Undead.To prevent this revival, the Tattoo of Osybus on the priest's body must be destroyed. The tattoo is invulnerable while the priest has at least 1 hit point. The tattoo is otherwise an object with AC 15, and it is immune to poison and psychic damage. It has 15 hit points, but it regains all its hit points at the end of every combatant's turn.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The priest attacks twice.

entries.name: Soul Blade
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it is paralyzed until the start of the priest's next turn. If this damage reduces a Medium or smaller creature to 0 hit points, the creature dies, and its soul is trapped in the priest's body, manifesting as a shadowy Soul Tattoo on the priest. The soul is freed if the priest dies.

entries.name: Necrotic Bolt
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the priest's next turn.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The owlbear has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The owlbear makes two Ravage attacks.

entries.name: Ravage
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature and the owlbear moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) Slashing damage and has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Screech (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Finesse Reaction Roll (15), each creature in a Close Emanation originating from the owlbear. Failure: 27 (6d8) Thunder damage, and the target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn. Success: Half damage only.

entries.name: Elemental Strike
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close or range Far, one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire or cold damage (the apprentice's choice).

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The apprentice casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (12)):At will: minor illusion1/day each: gust of wind, mage armor, silent image

entries.name: Evasion
entries.description: If the pledgemage is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the pledgemage instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails, provided it isn't incapacitated.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The pledgemage makes two Elemental Strike attacks.

entries.name: Elemental Strike
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close or range Far, one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) fire or cold damage (the pledgemage's choice).

entries.name: Showstopper (1/Day)
entries.description: The pledgemage shines with elemental magic, targeting one creature it can see within Far of itself. The target must make a Presence Reaction Roll (13). On a failed save, the target takes 28 (8d6) fire or cold damage (the pledgemage's choice) and is stunned until the start of the pledgemage's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The pledgemage casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (13)):At will: minor illusion2/day each: gust of wind, silent image1/day each: mage armor, water walk

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The professor makes three Cinder Strike attacks.

entries.name: Cinder Strike
entries.description: Melee Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) fire damage.

entries.name: Lightning Flourish (Recharge 6)
entries.description: The professor unleashes arcs of magical lightning at up to two creatures it can see within Far of itself. Each target must make a Agility Reaction Roll (15), taking 35 (10d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The professor casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: minor illusion2/day each: fog cloud, gust of wind, mage armor

entries.name: Water Walking
entries.description: The professor can walk across water and other liquids as if they were solid ground.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The professor makes three Tidal Strike attacks.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The professor casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: minor illusion2/day each: control water, create or destroy water, mage armor, stone shape1/day: wall of ice

entries.name: Tidal Strike
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close or range Far, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) cold damage.

entries.name: Divine Eminence
entries.description: As a bonus action, Prophetess can expend a spell slot to cause her melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Prophetess expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries.description: Prophetess has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: Prophetess is a 5th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save Difficulty (13), +5 to hit with spell attacks). Prophetess has the following cleric spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, spiritual weapon3rd level (2 slots): dispel magic, spirit guardians

entries.name: Maul
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The pseudodragon has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The pseudodragon makes two Bite attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Sting
entries.description: Finesse Reaction Roll (12), one creature the pseudodragon can see within Very Close. Failure: 5 (2d4) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition for 1 hour. While Poisoned, the target also has the Unconscious condition, which ends early if the target takes damage or a creature within Very Close of it takes an action to wake it.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The ashenwight makes two Necrotic Shard attacks. It also uses Psionic Crown if available.

entries.name: Necrotic Shard
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close or range Far, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Psionic Crown (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The ashenwight wreathes the head of a creature it can see within Far of itself with a crown of jagged, spectral crystals. The target must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (14) or have the charmed condition for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the target's thoughts are sluggish; it can't take reactions, its speed is halved, and it takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage at the start of each of its turns. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The ashenwight casts one of the following spells, requiring no spellcasting components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (14)):At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)1/day: calm emotions

entries.name: Lightning Absorption
entries.description: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (14)), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Engulf
entries.description: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed target is blinded, restrained, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (14) at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The shambling mound casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (8)):At will: minor illusion1/day: charm person (already cast)

entries.name: Aberrant Mind
entries.description: Magic can't read the psurlon's thoughts or put the psurlon to sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The psurlon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

entries.name: Psychic Crush
entries.description: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within Very Far of itself. The target must make a Presence Reaction Roll (13), taking 14 (2d10 + 3) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The psurlon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (13)):2/day each: disguise self, mage armor (self only)1/day: suggestion

entries.name: Aberrant Mind
entries.description: Magic can't read the psurlon's thoughts or put the psurlon to sleep.

entries.name: Two Heads
entries.description: The psurlon has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the frightened, stunned, or unconscious condition on itself. While one of the psurlon's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The psurlon makes two Bite attacks and two Claw attacks. It can also use Pacify (if available) or Psychic Crush.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Pacify (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within Very Far of itself. The target must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (16) or fall unconscious for 10 minutes. The condition ends if the target takes any damage or if another creature uses its action to shake the target awake.

entries.name: Psychic Crush
entries.description: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within Very Far of itself. The target must make a Presence Reaction Roll (16), taking 21 (3d10 + 5) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The psurlon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (16)):2/day each: disguise self, mage armor (self only)1/day each: dimension door, suggestion

entries.name: Aberrant Mind
entries.description: Magic can't read the psurlon's thoughts or put the psurlon to sleep.

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.

entries.name: Psychic Crush
entries.description: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within Very Far of itself. The target must make a Presence Reaction Roll (13), taking 12 (3d8 + 3) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The psurlon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (13)):2/day: mage armor (self only)1/day: suggestion

entries.name: Amorphous
entries.description: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

entries.name: Pseudopod
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach Very Close. Hit: 11 (3d6 + 1) Acid damage, and the target has Disadvantage on Intelligence saving throws until the end of the ooze's next turn.

entries.name: Psychic Crush
entries.description: Instinct Reaction Roll (10), one creature the ooze can see within Far. Failure: 13 (3d8) Psychic damage.

entries.name: Terror Dive
entries.description: If the pterafolk is flying and dives at least Close straight toward a target, and then hits that target with a melee weapon attack, the target is frightened until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The pterafolk makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. Alternatively, it makes two melee attacks with its javelin.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

entries.name: Javelin
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Flyby
entries.description: The pteranodon doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Tunneler
entries.description: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a Very Close-diameter tunnel in its wake.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The worm makes one Bite attack and one Tail Stinger attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +14, reach Very Close. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (19)), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

entries.name: Tail Stinger
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +14, reach Very Close. Hit: 16 (2d6 + 9) Piercing damage plus 35 (10d6) Poison damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The wormling makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a Small or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Agility Reaction Roll (13) or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wormling, and it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of the wormling's turns.If the wormling takes 10 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the wormling must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (21) at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within Very Close of the wormling. If the wormling dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using Very Close of movement, exiting prone.

entries.name: Tail Stinger
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (13), taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries.description: The drone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

entries.name: Disintegration
entries.description: If the drone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The drone makes two fist attacks or four shortbow attacks.

entries.name: Fist
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Shortbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Detention Orb
entries.description: The drone launches a tiny orb of magical force at a creature it can see within Close of itself. The creature must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (15) or be encased in the orb, which expands to a size just large enough to contain the creature. While encased, the creature doesn't need to breathe, eat, or drink, and it doesn't age. Nothing can pass through the orb, nor can any creature teleport or use planar travel to enter or exit the orb. As a bonus action, the drone can move the orb and its contents up to Close in any direction. A successful casting of the Dispel Magic spell on the orb (Difficulty (15)) destroys it. The orb otherwise remains intact until the drone spends an action to end the effect or the drone is destroyed. A drone can have only one detention orb active at a time; if the drone creates a detention orb when it already has one active, the first orb disappears, freeing the creature inside.

entries.name: Bloodied Fury
entries.description: While Bloodied, the quaggoth has Advantage on attack rolls.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The quaggoth makes two Claw attacks.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage, or 13 (3d6 + 3) Slashing damage if the quaggoth is Bloodied.

entries.name: Bloodied Fury
entries.description: While Bloodied, the quaggoth has Advantage on attack rolls.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The quaggoth makes two Claw attacks.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) Psychic damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The quaggoth casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (12)):At will: Mage Hand (the hand is Invisible), Minor Illusion2/day: Mind Spike

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The apprentice makes two Exponential Lash attacks.

entries.name: Exponential Lash
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close or range Far, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) force damage, and the apprentice can cause one creature it can see within Close of the target to take 9 (2d6 + 2) force damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The apprentice casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (12)):At will: guidance, mage hand1/day each: enlarge/reduce, mage armor

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The pledgemage makes two Exponential Lash attacks.

entries.name: Exponential Lash
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close or range Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) force damage, and the pledgemage can cause one creature it can see within Close of the target to take 10 (2d6 + 3) force damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The pledgemage casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (13)):At will: guidance, mage hand1/day each: dimension door, enlarge/reduce, mage armor, plant growth

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The professor makes two Spatial Blade attacks.

entries.name: Spatial Blade
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit (the target can't benefit from cover less than total cover), reach Very Close or range Very Far, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) force damage, or 22 (4d8 + 4) force damage if the professor is Large or larger, and the professor can push the target horizontally up to Very Close away.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The professor casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: guidance, mage hand, mending (as an action)1/day each: creation (as an action), dimension door, mage armor, plant growth, polymorph

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The professor makes two Heuristic Lance attacks. It can also use Overriding Theorem, if available.

entries.name: Heuristic Lance
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close or range Far, one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) psychic damage, and the target is poisoned until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Overriding Theorem (Recharge 4–6)
entries.description: The professor magically influences the mind of up to two creatures it can see within Far of itself. Each target must succeed on a Instinct Reaction Roll (15) or become charmed by the professor until the start of the professor's next turn. The charmed creature must immediately use its reaction, if available, to move up its speed toward another creature of the professor's choice and make one melee attack against that other creature.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The professor casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: guidance, mage hand, minor illusion1/day each: mage armor, major image, mirage arcane (as an action), Rary's telepathic bond

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The quasit has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Invisibility
entries.description: The quasit casts Invisibility on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the quasit's next turn.

entries.name: Scare (1/Day)
entries.description: Presence Reaction Roll (10), one creature within Close. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

entries.name: Shape-Shift
entries.description: The quasit shape-shifts to resemble a bat (Speed Very Close, Fly Far), a centipede (Far, Climb Far), or a toad (Far, Swim Far), or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The quavilithku has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: The quavilithku can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Web Sense
entries.description: When in contact with a web, the quavilithku knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

entries.name: Web Walker
entries.description: The quavilithku ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The quavilithku makes two Bite attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (18) or have the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, a creature can't regain hit points. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Dissolving Web (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The quavilithku expels acid-drenched webs in a Far cone. Each creature in that area must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (18), taking 44 (8d10) acid damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Nonmagical objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried take 44 (8d10) acid damage.

entries.name: Inspiring Presence
entries.description: Creatures of Forfallen's choice (excluding herself) in a Close Emanation originating from her have Advantage on attack rolls. She can't use this trait if she has the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: Forfallen has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Forfallen makes three attacks, using Greataxe or Handaxe in any combination.

entries.name: Greataxe
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) Slashing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Handaxe
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close or range Close. Hit: 22 (5d6 + 5) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Aura of Bravery
entries.description: Creatures of the knight's choice in a Close Emanation originating from it have Immunity to the Charmed and Frightened conditions while there.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The knight makes three attacks, using Greatsword or Longbow in any combination.

entries.name: Greatsword
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 22 (5d8) Radiant damage.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range Very Far. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 22 (5d8) Radiant damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The knight casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (16)):1/day each: Daylight, Dispel Evil and Good, Greater Restoration, Phantom Steed

entries.name: Flyby
entries.description: The quetzalcoatlus doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage. If the quetzalcoatlus flew least Close toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

entries.name: Blurred Movement
entries.description: Attack rolls against the quickling have disadvantage unless it is incapacitated or its speed is 0.

entries.name: Evasion
entries.description: If the quickling is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails, provided it isn't incapacitated.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The quickling makes three Dagger attacks.

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage.

entries.name: Aura of False Divinity
entries.description: A creature that starts its turn within Close of the radiant idol must make a Presence Reaction Roll (17), provided the radiant idol isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the radiant idol. A creature charmed in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, a creature is immune to this radiant idol's Aura of False Divinity for 24 hours.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries.description: The radiant idol's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save Difficulty (17)). The radiant idol can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:At will: charm person, cure wounds, disguise self, thaumaturgy1/day each: commune, dominate person, insect plague, mass suggestion, raise dead

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The radiant idol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The radiant idol makes two melee attacks.

entries.name: Flail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

entries.name: Radiant Strike (1/Day)
entries.description: The radiant idol chooses a point on the ground it can see within Far of it. A Close-radius, Far-high cylinder of bright light appears there until the start of the radiant idol's next turn. Each creature in the cylinder when it appears or that ends its turn there must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (17), taking 36 (8d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Deadly Critical
entries.description: Rak Tulkhesh scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 and rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries.description: Rak Tulkhesh's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save Difficulty (24)). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:At will: detect thoughts, dispel magic, spirit guardians1/day each: banishing smite, blinding smite, staggering smite

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Rak Tulkhesh fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: Rak Tulkhesh has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Whirlwind of Weapons
entries.description: A magical aura of weapons surrounds Rak Tulkhesh in a Very Close radius. At the start of each of his turns, any other creature in the aura takes 14 (4d6) force damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Rak Tulkhesh makes four weapon attacks.

entries.name: Spawned Melee Weapon
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 28 (3d12 + 9) force damage.

entries.name: Spawned Ranged Weapon
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) force damage.

entries.name: Change Shape
entries.description: Rak Tulkhesh magically polymorphs into a humanoid, beast, or giant that has a challenge rating no higher than his own, or back into his true form. He reverts to his true form if he dies. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (his choice).In a new form, Rak Tulkhesh retains his alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. His statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

entries.name: Captivating Presence
entries.description: Any creature that starts its turn within Close of Rakdos must make a Presence Reaction Roll (25). On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by Rakdos for 1 minute or until the creature is farther than Close away from him. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to Rakdos's Captivating Presence for 24 hours.

entries.name: Cruel Entertainment
entries.description: When a creature Rakdos can see within Far of him is reduced to 0 hit points, Rakdos gains 25 temporary hit points.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries.description: Rakdos's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save Difficulty (25)). He can innately cast hellish rebuke (at 5th level) at will, requiring no material components.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Rakdos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: Rakdos has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Magic Weapons
entries.description: Rakdos's weapon attacks are magical.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Rakdos makes two attacks with his Curtain-Call Scythe or his claws.

entries.name: Curtain-Call Scythe
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) fire damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The lampooner is a 4th-level Rakdos spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save Difficulty (14), +6 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following bard spells:Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, minor illusion, vicious mockery1st level (4 slots): bane, dissonant whispers, silent image, Tasha's hideous laughter, thunderwave2nd level (3 slots): crown of madness, enthrall, suggestion

entries.name: Club
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Nimble
entries.description: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The juggler makes three dagger attacks.

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Nimble
entries.description: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The fire eater makes two attacks with its bladed chain.

entries.name: Bladed Chain
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Spew Flame (Recharge 4–6)
entries.description: The fire eater exhales flames. Each creature in a Close cone must make a Agility Reaction Roll (13), taking 9 (2d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Nimble
entries.description: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The acrobat makes two attacks with its barbed pole.

entries.name: Barbed Pole
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the acrobat can jump up to Close. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The raklupis has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: The raklupis can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Web Sense
entries.description: When in contact with a web, the raklupis knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

entries.name: Web Walker
entries.description: The raklupis ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The raklupis makes a Bite attack and two Serrated Sword attacks. It can use Venom Globe in place of one of these attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) poison damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (20) or have the poisoned condition for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, a creature has the incapacitated condition and can't regain hit points. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Serrated Sword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 19 (4d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) poison damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The raklupis casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (20)).At will: Disguise Self, Invisibility (self only), Mage Hand, Minor Illusion2/day each: Darkness, Dominate Monster, Mass Suggestion, Telekinesis, Teleport

entries.name: Venom Globe
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 45 (10d8) poison damage.

entries.name: Fiendish Restoration
entries.description: If the rakshasa dies outside the Nine Hells, its body turns to ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

entries.name: Greater Magic Resistance
entries.description: The rakshasa automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and the attack rolls of spells automatically miss it. Without the rakshasa's permission, no spell can observe the rakshasa remotely or detect its thoughts, creature type, or alignment.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The rakshasa makes three Cursed Touch attacks.

entries.name: Cursed Touch
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach Very Close. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 19 (3d12) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target gains no benefit from finishing a Short or Long Rest.

entries.name: Baleful Command (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Presence Reaction Roll (18), each enemy in a Close Emanation originating from the rakshasa. Failure: 28 (8d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened and Incapacitated conditions until the start of the rakshasa's next turn.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The rakshasa casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (18)):At will: Detect Magic, Detect Thoughts, Disguise Self, Mage Hand, Minor Illusion1/day each: Fly, Invisibility, Major Image, Plane Shift

entries.name: Agile
entries.description: The rat doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it moves out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach Very Close. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

entries.name: Mimicry
entries.description: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a whisper or chitter. A hearer can discern the sounds are imitations with a successful Difficulty (10) Wisdom (Insight) check.

entries.name: Beak
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

entries.name: Searing Armor
entries.description: The razerblast's armor is hot. Any creature grappling the razerblast or grappled by it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the end of that creature's turn.

entries.name: Shrapnel Explosion
entries.description: When the razerblast drops to 0 hit points, a flaming orb in its chest explodes, destroying the razerblast's body and scattering its armor as shrapnel. Creatures within Very Close of the razerblast when it explodes must succeed on a Agility Reaction Roll (12), taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Multiattack
