entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 11 (2d10) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

entries.name: Chromatic Orb (1/Day)
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range Far, one creature. Hit: 18 (4d8) damage of a type chosen by the assassin: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

entries.name: Evasion
entries.description: If the marauder is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the marauder instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half as much damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The marauder makes three Aberrant Strike attacks.

entries.name: Aberrant Strike
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage, plus 21 (6d6) Force damage if the marauder had Advantage on the attack roll.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The marauder casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (17)):At will: Message1/day: Disintegrate

entries.name: Aberrant Surge
entries.description: When the ruffian casts Witch Bolt, roll 1d8. On an even number, the ruffian gains a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to the number rolled. On an odd number, one creature of the ruffian's choice within Close of it takes Force damage equal to the number rolled; if no other creatures are in range, it takes the damage.

entries.name: Spear
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close or range Close. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The ruffian casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (12), +4 to hit with spell attacks):At will: Thaumaturgy1/day: Witch Bolt

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)
entries.description: If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The tarrasque has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Reflective Carapace
entries.description: If the tarrasque is targeted by a Magic Missile spell or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll 1d6. On a 1-5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected and reflects the spell, turning the caster into the target.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries.description: The tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tarrasque makes one Bite attack and three other attacks, using Claw or Tail in any combination.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +19, reach Close. Hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) Piercing damage, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (20)). Until the grapple ends, the target has the Restrained condition and can't teleport.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +19, reach Close. Hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +19, reach Close. Hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Thunderous Bellow (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Finesse Reaction Roll (27), each creature and each object that isn't being worn or carried in a Very Far Cone. Failure: 78 (12d12) Thunder damage, and the target has the Deafened and Frightened conditions until the end of its next turn. Success: Half damage only.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries.description: The Telepathic Pentacle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

entries.name: Multiple Heads
entries.description: The Telepathic Pentacle has five heads. While it has more than one head, the Telepathic Pentacle has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.Whenever the Telepathic Pentacle takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the Telepathic Pentacle dies.At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The Telepathic Pentacle regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

entries.name: Reactive Heads
entries.description: For each head the Telepathic Pentacle has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

entries.name: Wakeful
entries.description: While the Telepathic Pentacle sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The Telepathic Pentacle makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

entries.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries.description: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The spirit takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If the spirit fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The spirit makes two Lightning Fist or Hailstone attacks in any combination.

entries.name: Lightning Fist
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) lightning damage.

entries.name: Hailstone
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

entries.name: Death Bolt (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The spirit hurls a magical lightning bolt in a Very Far line that is Very Close wide. Each creature in that area must make a Agility Reaction Roll (18), taking 27 (6d8) lightning damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a success or failure, an affected creature's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The creature dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

entries.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries.description: The terracotta warrior is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the terracotta warrior must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the terracotta warrior remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a terracotta statue.

entries.name: Fragile
entries.description: If a critical hit is scored against the terracotta warrior, it shatters and is destroyed.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The terracotta warrior makes two melee attacks.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Disintegration
entries.description: If the magen dies, it disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The magen has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The magen makes two attacks, using Hammer Fist or Thunderous Boom in any combination.

entries.name: Hammer Fist
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) Force damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The magen casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: Mage Hand, Mending, Prestidigitation1/day each: Disintegrate, Move Earth, Stone Shape

entries.name: Thunderous Boom
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range Far. Hit: 28 (8d6) Thunder damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The hunter makes three attacks, using Shortsword or Longbow in any combination.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range Very Far. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target's Speed is reduced by Very Close until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Doomvault Devotion
entries.description: Within the Doomvault, the apprentice has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The apprentice is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save Difficulty (12), +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp1st level (4 slots): burning hands, detect magic, mage armor, shield2nd level (3 slots): blur, scorching ray

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Doomvault Devotion
entries.description: Within the Doomvault, the warrior has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The warrior makes two melee attacks.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Javelin
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Alien Mind
entries.description: If a creature tries to read the Bagman's thoughts, that creature must succeed on a Instinct Reaction Roll (8) or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Amorphous
entries.description: The Bagman can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

entries.name: Grappler
entries.description: The Bagman has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries.description: The Bagman has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The Bagman regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the Bagman takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the Bagman's next turn. The Bagman dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The Bagman makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Adamantine Plating
entries.description: Any critical hit against the Lord of Blades becomes a normal hit.

entries.name: Bladed Armor
entries.description: A creature that grapples the Lord of Blades or is grappled by him takes 13 (3d8) slashing damage. A creature takes 13 (3d8) slashing damage if it starts its turn grappling or being grappled by the Lord of Blades.

entries.name: Charge
entries.description: If the Lord of Blades moves at least Very Close straight toward a target and then hits it with his adamantine sixblade on the same turn, the target takes an extra 11 (2d10) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (19) or be pushed up to Very Close away and knocked prone.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The Lord of Blades is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save Difficulty (18), +10 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following artificer spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): fire bolt (see "Actions" below), mage hand, mending, prestidigitation1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, sanctuary, thunderwave2nd level (3 slots): blur, heat metal, scorching ray, see invisibility3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, fly, haste4th level (3 slots): freedom of movement, Mordenkainen's faithful hound5th level (2 slots): animate objects, wall of force

entries.name: Warforged Resilience
entries.description: The Lord of Blades has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned, is immune to disease, and magic can't put him to sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The Lord of Blades makes three attacks: two with his adamantine sixblade and one with his bladed wings.

entries.name: Adamantine Sixblade
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

entries.name: Bladed Wings
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage.

entries.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +10 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 22 (4d10) fire damage.

entries.name: Spell Turning
entries.description: The chimera has advantage on a saving throw against any spell that targets only the chimera (not an area). If the chimera's saving throw is successful and the spell is of 4th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the chimera and instead targets the caster.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its claws, one with its head, and one with its tail. When its breath weapon is available, it can use the breath in place of its head or its claws.

entries.name: Claws
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Head
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The chimera exhales fire in a Close cone. Each creature in that area must make a Agility Reaction Roll (15), taking 32 (5d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The thessalhydra makes one maw attack and one Flurry of Bites.

entries.name: Flurry of Bites
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (4d4) poison damage.

entries.name: Maw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) acid damage.

entries.name: Tail Pincer
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage, and the target is grappled. As an action, the target can escape the grapple by succeeding on a Difficulty (14) Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check (its choice). Until this grapple ends, the thessalhydra can't use its tail pincer.

entries.name: Acid Saliva (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The thessalhydra spits a glob of acid at a point it can see within Close of it. Each creature within Very Close of that point must make a Agility Reaction Roll (15), taking 18 (4d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Adhesive Blossoms
entries.description: The thorn slinger adheres to anything that touches it. A Medium or smaller creature adhered to the thorn slinger is also grappled by it (escape Difficulty (11)). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.At the end of each of the thorn slinger's turns, anything grappled by it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the thorn slinger remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate bush.

entries.name: Thorns
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.

entries.name: Plant Camouflage
entries.description: The thorny has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring vegetation.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The thorny regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the thorny's next turn. The thorny dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Thorny Body
entries.description: At the start of its turn, the thorny deals 2 (1d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) piercing damage.

entries.name: Cunning Action
entries.description: On each of its turns, the thought spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The thought spy's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save Difficulty (13)). The thought spy can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:At will: charm person, disguise self, encode thoughts (see chapter 2)1/day each: blur, detect thoughts, gaseous form

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The thought spy makes two melee attacks, or it makes three ranged attacks with its daggers.

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Rapier
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka attacks and one Chatkcha attack.

entries.name: Gythka
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit (with advantage if the thri-kreen is missing any hit points), reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Chatkcha
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit (with advantage if the thri-kreen is missing any hit points), range Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka or Chatkcha attacks.

entries.name: Gythka
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

entries.name: Chatkcha
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The thri-kreen makes two attacks, using Gythka or Chatkcha in any combination.

entries.name: Gythka
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) Slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

entries.name: Chatkcha
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range Close. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka attacks or four Psychic Bolt attacks.

entries.name: Gythka
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) slashing damage.

entries.name: Psychic Bolt
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range Far, one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) psychic damage.

entries.name: Drain Vitality (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: The thri-kreen targets one creature it can see within Close of itself. The target must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (14), taking 32 (5d12) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The thri-kreen regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The thri-kreen casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:At will: levitate (self only), mage hand (the hand is invisible)1/day each: freedom of movement (self only), invisibility (self only)

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The thri-kreen makes three Psionic Lance attacks.

entries.name: Psionic Lance
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close or range Very Far. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) Psychic damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The thri-kreen casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: Mage Hand (the hand is Invisible)1/day each: Detect Thoughts, Sending, Synaptic Static

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Succeed on a DC14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Club
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

entries.name: Time Breath (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The dragon exhales a wave of shimmering light in a Close cone. Nonmagical objects and vegetation in that area that aren't being worn or carried crumble to dust. Each creature in that area must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (14). On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (6d8) force damage and is magically weakened as it is desynchronized from the time stream. While the creature is in this state, attack rolls against it have advantage. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A weakened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries.description: The tin soldier is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the tin soldier must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: While the tin soldier remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tin soldier makes two melee attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Beast of Burden
entries.description: The titanothere is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

entries.name: Stomp
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the titanothere moved at least Close straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 13 (3d8) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (18) or have the prone condition if it is a creature.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Titivilus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: Titivilus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: Titivilus regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Titivilus dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Ventriloquism
entries.description: Whenever Titivilus speaks, he can choose a point within Far of him; his voice emanates from that point.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Titivilus makes one Silver Sword attack, and he uses Frightful Word.

entries.name: Silver Sword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) force damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage if used with two hands, plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the necrotic damage taken.

entries.name: Frightful Word
entries.description: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within Very Close of him. The target must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (21) or become frightened of him for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, the target must take the Dash action and move away from Titivilus by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash action. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: Titivilus casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (21)):At will: alter self, major image, nondetection, sending, suggestion3/day each: mislead, modify memory

entries.name: Teleport
entries.description: Titivilus teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to Very Far to an unoccupied space he can see.

entries.name: Twisting Words
entries.description: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within Far of him. The target must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (21) or become charmed by Titivilus for 1 minute. The charmed target can repeat the saving throw if Titivilus deals any damage to it. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to Titivilus's Twisting Words for 24 hours.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The tlacatecolo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tlacatecolo makes two Talon attacks.

entries.name: Talon
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (3d8) poison damage.

entries.name: Change Shape
entries.description: The tlacatecolo magically transforms into a Medium owl, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the tlacatecolo is reduced to 0 hit points or if it uses its action to end it.

entries.name: Plague Winds (Fiend Form Only; Recharge 5-6)
entries.description: The tlacatecolo emits a chilling, disease-ridden wind in a Far line that is Very Close wide. Each creature in that area must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (13) or take 26 (4d12) cold damage and become poisoned.While poisoned in this way, the creature can't regain hit points. At the end of every hour, the creature must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (13) or gain 1 level of exhaustion. If the creature is in direct sunlight when it makes this saving throw, it automatically succeeds on the save.If the creature is targeted by magic that ends a poison or disease, such as lesser restoration, while the creature isn't in direct sunlight, the effect does not end.

entries.name: Fire Aura
entries.description: At the start of each of the tlexolotl's turns, each creature within Very Close of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in that aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the tlexolotl or hits it with a melee attack while within Very Close of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

entries.name: Illumination
entries.description: The tlexolotl sheds bright light in a Close radius and dim light for an additional Close.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The tlexolotl regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the tlexolotl takes cold damage or is immersed in water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the tlexolotl's next turn. The tlexolotl dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tlexolotl makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 12 (1d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) fire damage.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (1d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (19) or be pushed up to Very Close away from the tlexolotl and knocked prone.

entries.name: Pyroclasm (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Gouts of molten lava erupt from the tlexolotl's body. Each creature in a Close-radius sphere centered on the tlexolotl must make a Agility Reaction Roll (15). On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 21 (6d6) fire damage and 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage. On a successful saving throw, a creature takes half as much damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tlincalli makes one Longsword or Spiked Chain attack and one Sting attack.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Spiked Chain
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (11)) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tlincalli can't use the spiked chain against another target.

entries.name: Sting
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (14) or be poisoned for 1 minute. If it fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries.description: While in sunlight, the tomb dwarf has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tomb dwarf makes two longsword attacks or two crossbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

entries.name: Life Drain
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (13) or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the tomb dwarf's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The tomb dwarf can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

entries.name: Battleaxe
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Light Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Aversion of Fire
entries.description: If the tomb guardian takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Berserk
entries.description: Whenever the tomb guardian starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the tomb guardian goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the tomb guardian attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the tomb guardian attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the tomb guardian goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. The golem's creator, if within Far of the berserk tomb guardian, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The tomb guardian must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a Difficulty (15) Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the tomb guardian ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the tomb guardian might go berserk again.

entries.name: Immutable Form
entries.description: The tomb guardian is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

entries.name: Lightning Absorption
entries.description: Whenever the tomb guardian is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The tomb guardian has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Magic Weapons
entries.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tomb guardian makes two slam attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Petrified Death
entries.description: A tomb tapper reduced to 0 hit points turns into a lifeless stone statue. Anything it's wearing or carrying is not transformed.

entries.name: Sense Magic
entries.description: The tomb tapper senses magic within Close of it and can use an action to pinpoint the location of any creature, object, or area in that range that bears magic. This sense penetrates barriers but is blocked by a thin sheet of lead.

entries.name: Tunneler
entries.description: The tomb tapper can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a Very Close-wide, Close-tall tunnel in its wake.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The tomb tapper doesn't require air or sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tomb tapper makes two melee attacks with its sledgehammer or with its claws. If it hits the same creature with both claws, it can pull that creature within Very Close of its mouth and make a bite attack against it.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.

entries.name: Sledgehammer
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 27 (6d6 + 6) bludgeoning or force damage (tomb tapper's choice). If thrown, the hammer returns to the tomb tapper at the end of its turn, landing at the tomb tapper's feet if it doesn't have a hand free to catch the weapon.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries.description: The dragon can breathe both air and water.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) necrotic damage.

entries.name: Desiccating Breath (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The dragon exhales yellowish necrotic energy in a Close cone. Each creature in that area must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (11). On a failed save, the creature takes 21 (6d6) necrotic damage and is weakened until the end of its next turn. A weakened creature has disadvantage on Strength-based ability checks and Strength saving throws, and the creature's weapon attacks that rely on Strength deal half damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (12)):1/day: bane

entries.name: Gem Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 400 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use its Mass Telekinesis action during the next hour. Award a party an additional 90,000 XP (180,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Gem Awakening activates.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries.description: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 18 (2d8 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (19)) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

entries.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The greatwyrm exhales crushing force in a Very Far cone. Each creature in that area must make a Agility Reaction Roll (25). On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) force damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. On a success or failure, the creature's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Mass Telekinesis (Gem Awakening Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: The greatwyrm targets any number of creatures and objects it can see within Very Far of it. No one target can weigh more than 4,000 pounds, and objects can't be targeted if they're being worn or carried. Each targeted creature must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (26) or be restrained in the greatwyrm's telekinetic grip. At the end of a creature's turn, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.At the end of the greatwyrm's turn, it can move each creature or object it has in its telekinetic grip up to Far in any direction, but not beyond Very Far of itself. In addition, it can choose any number of creatures restrained in this way and deal 45 (7d12) force damage to each of them.

entries.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The greatwyrm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (26), +18 to hit with spell attack):1/day each: dispel magic, forcecage, plane shift, reverse gravity, time stop

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries.description: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

entries.name: Spear
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands in melee.

entries.name: Light Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

entries.name: Shell Defense
entries.description: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries.description: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tortle makes four Claw attacks or two Nature's Wrath attacks.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

entries.name: Nature's Wrath
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) damage of a type chosen by the tortle: cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

entries.name: Shell Defense
entries.description: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The tortle casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (12)):At will: druidcraft, guidance2/day each: cure wounds, hold person, speak with animals, thunderwave

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The tough has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the tough's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Mace
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +3, range Far. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The tough has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the tough's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tough makes two attacks, using Warhammer or Heavy Crossbow in any combination.

entries.name: Warhammer
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the tough pushes the target up to Very Close straight away from itself.

entries.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range Far. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Unarmored Defense
entries.description: While the tower hand is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tower hand makes two Unarmed Strike attacks, two Dart attacks, or one of each.

entries.name: Unarmed Strike
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Dart
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tower sage makes two Arcane Burst attacks and can use Starry Radiance if available.

entries.name: Arcane Burst
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close or range Very Far, one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) radiant damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The tower sage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (13)):At will: Dancing Lights, Mage Hand, Prestidigitation1/day each: Arcane Lock, Burning Hands, Comprehend Languages, Detect Magic, Levitate, Mage Armor

entries.name: Starry Radiance (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Dazzling light bursts from the tower sage's fingertips in a Close cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (13) or have the blinded condition until the end of the tower sage's next turn.

entries.name: Instinctive Reflexes
entries.description: The conduit has advantage on initiative rolls, and it can't have disadvantage on attack rolls.

entries.name: Unarmored Defense
entries.description: While the conduit is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The conduit makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

entries.name: Unarmed Strike
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the conduit can choose one of the following additional effects (up to once per turn each):Incapacitate. The target must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (15) or have the incapacitated condition until the end of the conduit's next turn.Push. The target is pushed up to Very Close horizontally away from the conduit.

entries.name: Unarmored Defense
entries.description: While the instinct is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The instinct makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

entries.name: Unarmed Strike
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Transmuter's Stone
entries.description: The transmuter carries a magic stone it crafted. The stone grants it one of the following benefits while bearing the stone; the transmuter chooses the benefit at the end of each long rest:Darkvision. The transmuter has darkvision out to a range of Far.Resilience. The transmuter has proficiency in Constitution saving throws. Resistance. The transmuter has resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (transmuter's choice whenever choosing this benefit).Speed. The transmuter's walking speed is increased by Very Close.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The transmuter makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

entries.name: Arcane Burst
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close or range Very Far, one target. Hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) acid damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The transmuter casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (14)):At will: light, message, prestidigitation2/day each: fireball, hold person, knock, mage armor, polymorph, slow1/day: telekinesis

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: If the trapper is motionless on a floor, wall, or ceiling at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the trapper move or act, that creature must succeed on a Difficulty (18) Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the trapper isn't part of the floor, wall, or ceiling.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: The trapper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Smother
entries.description: One Large or smaller creature within Very Close of the trapper must succeed on a Agility Reaction Roll (13) or be grappled (escape Difficulty (14)). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. While grappled in this way, the target is restrained, blinded, and deprived of air. The trapper can smother only one creature at a time.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries.description: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The treant makes two Slam attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach Very Close. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Hail of Bark
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +10, range Very Far. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
entries.description: The treant magically animates up to two trees it can see within Far of itself. Each tree uses the Treant stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, it can't speak, and it lacks this action. The tree takes its turn immediately after the treant on the same Initiative count, and it obeys the treant. A tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, the treant dies, or it is more than Very Far from the treant. The tree then takes root if possible.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: If the treant is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the treant move or act, that creature must succeed on a Difficulty (18) Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the treant is animate.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The treant makes two Slam attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Rock
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range Close, one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
entries.description: The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within Far of it. These trees have the same statistics as an awakened tree (see the Monster Manual), except they can't speak. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, until the treant dies or is more than Very Far from the tree, or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The blight makes two Branch attacks and uses Grasping Root.

entries.name: Branch
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Close. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Grasping Root
entries.description: Strength Reaction Roll (17), one Large or smaller creature the blight can see within Close. Failure: The target is pulled up to Very Close straight toward the blight and has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (16)) from one of six roots. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 13 (2d6 + 6) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns.

entries.name: Detect Invisibility
entries.description: Within Far of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym's sight.

entries.name: Familiar
entries.description: With the DM's permission, a person who casts the find familiar spell can choose to conjure a tressym instead of a normal cat.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries.description: The tressym has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

entries.name: Poison Sense
entries.description: The tressym can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.

entries.name: Claws
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

entries.name: Detect Invisibility
entries.description: Within Far of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym's sight.

entries.name: Familiar
entries.description: With the DM's permission, a person who casts the find familiar spell can choose to conjure a tressym instead of a normal cat.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries.description: The tressym has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

entries.name: Poison Sense
entries.description: The tressym can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.

entries.name: Claws
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tri-flower frond uses its orange blossom, then its yellow blossom, and then its red blossom.

entries.name: Orange Blossom
entries.description: The tri-flower frond chooses one creature it can see within Very Close of it. The target must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (11) or be poisoned for 1 hour. While poisoned in this way, the target is unconscious. At the end of each minute, the poisoned target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Yellow Blossom
entries.description: The tri-flower frond chooses one creature it can see within Very Close of it. The target must succeed on a Agility Reaction Roll (11), or it is covered with corrosive sap and takes 5 acid damage at the start of each of its turns. Dousing the target with water reduces the acid damage by 1 point per pint or flask of water used.

entries.name: Red Blossom
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (11)). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 5 (2d4) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The red blossom can grapple only one target at a time. Another creature within reach of the tri-flower frond can use its action to end the grapple on the target.

entries.name: Spear
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The triceratops makes two Gore attacks.

entries.name: Gore
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close. Hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) Piercing damage. If the target is Huge or smaller and the triceratops moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) Piercing damage and has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries.description: The triton can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries.description: The triton's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save Difficulty (15), +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:At will: ray of frost (see "Actions" below)2/day: cone of cold1/day each: fog cloud, gust of wind, wind wall

entries.name: Summon Water Weird (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: As a bonus action, the triton magically summons 1d4 water weirds. The summoned weirds appear in unoccupied spaces in water within Far of the triton. The water weirds act immediately after the triton on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear if the triton dies.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The triton makes two attacks using Wave Touch and casts ray of frost.

entries.name: Wave Touch
entries.description: Melee Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 22 (4d10) cold damage.

entries.name: Ray of Frost (Cantrip)
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range Far, one creature. Hit: 13 (3d8) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by Very Close until the start of the triton's next turn.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries.description: The triton can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries.description: The triton's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save Difficulty (12)). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:1/day each: fog cloud, gust of wind

entries.name: Nimble Escape
entries.description: The triton can take the Disengage or Hide actions as a bonus action on each of its turns.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The triton makes two urchin-spine shortsword attacks.

entries.name: Urchin-Spine Shortsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, that creature is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

entries.name: Poisoned Spine
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

entries.name: Stench
entries.description: Finesse Reaction Roll (12), any creature (other than a troglodyte) that starts its turn in a Very Close Emanation originating from the troglodyte. Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to the Stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries.description: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Chameleon Skin
entries.description: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

entries.name: Stench
entries.description: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within Very Close of the troglodyte must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (14) or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries.description: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with either its claws or its greatclub.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Greatclub
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
entries.description: The troglodyte spits acid in a line Close long and Very Close wide. Each creature in that line must make a Agility Reaction Roll (14), taking 10 (3d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Loathsome Limbs (4/Day)
entries.description: If the troll ends any turn Bloodied and took 15+ Slashing damage during that turn, one of the troll's limbs is severed, falls into the troll's space, and becomes a Troll Limb. The limb acts immediately after the troll's turn. The troll has 1 Exhaustion level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The troll regains 15 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes Acid or Fire damage, this trait doesn't function on the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The troll makes three Rend attacks.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If the amalgam fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The amalgam has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The amalgam regains 15 hit points at the start of its turn. If the amalgam takes acid or fire damage, it regains only 5 hit points at the start of its next turn. The amalgam dies only if it takes 20 or more acid or fire damage while it has 0 hit points.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The amalgam makes three Rend attacks.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) slashing damage.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The limb regains 5 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the limb takes Acid or Fire damage, this trait doesn't function on the limb's next turn. The limb dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Troll Spawn
entries.description: The limb uncannily has the same senses as a whole troll. If the limb isn't destroyed within 24 hours, roll 1d12. On a 12, the limb turns into a Troll. Otherwise, the limb withers away.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Mutation
entries.description: When the troll mutate is created, it gains one of four possible body mutations at random: 1, Elastic Body; 2, Psionic Mirror; 3, Spell Scarred; or 4, Winged Form. This mutation determines certain traits in this stat block.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The mutate regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the mutate takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the mutate's next turn. The mutate dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate. If the mutate starts its turn with 0 hit points and regenerates, it randomly gains a mutation it doesn't already have (up to a maximum of four mutations).

entries.name: Amorphous (Elastic Body Only)
entries.description: The mutate can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

entries.name: Magic Resistance (Spell Scarred Only)
entries.description: The mutate has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Psychic Rebuke (Psionic Mirror Only)
entries.description: If the mutate takes psychic damage, each creature within Close of it takes that damage as well.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The mutate makes two Rend attacks.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close (or Close if the mutate has the Elastic Body mutation), one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) force damage.

entries.name: Psychic Burst (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The mutate unleashes a wave of psychic energy. Each creature within Close of the mutate must make a Instinct Reaction Roll (14), taking 28 (8d6) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Tromokratis

entries.name: Amphibious
entries.description: Tromokratis can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Hearts of the Kraken (Mythic Trait; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: When Tromokratis is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, the damage creates cracks in its carapace, revealing its hearts. Tromokratis has four hearts: two on its chest, one on its back, and one at the base of its tail. A heart has an AC of 22 and 100 hit points. It is immune to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks, and it is immune to all conditions. If it is forced to make a saving throw, treat its ability scores as 10 (+0). If it finishes a short or long rest, the carapace heals, any destroyed hearts regenerate, and the hearts are covered again. Tromokratis dies when all the hearts are destroyed.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Tromokratis fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Weapons
entries.description: Tromokratis's weapon attacks are magical.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries.description: Tromokratis deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Spell-Resistant Carapace
entries.description: Tromokratis has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature that makes a spell attack against Tromokratis has disadvantage on the attack roll.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Tromokratis makes three attacks: one with its pincer, one with its tail, and one with its tentacle grasp.

entries.name: Pincer
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (26)). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Tromokratis can't use this attack on anyone else.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked prone.

entries.name: Tentacle Grasp
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach Close, one creature. Hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (26)). If the target doesn't escape by the end of its next turn, Tromokratis throws the target up to Far in a straight line. The target lands prone and takes 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 29 (3d12 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by Tromokratis, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Tromokratis, and it takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of Tromokratis's turns. If Tromokratis takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Tromokratis must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (20) at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within Very Close of Tromokratis. If Tromokratis dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using Close of movement, exiting prone.

original_cr: 26 (XP 90,000, or 180,000 as a mythic encounter; PB +8)

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries.description: Trostani's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save Difficulty (24)). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:At will: dispel magic, druidcraft3/day each: bless, conjure animals, giant insect, moonbeam, plant growth, spike growth, suggestion1/day each: conjure fey, mass cure wounds

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If Trostani fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: Trostani has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Magic Weapons
entries.description: Trostani's weapon attacks are magical.

entries.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries.description: Trostani can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

entries.name: Tree Stride
entries.description: Once on her turn, Trostani can use Very Close of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within Far of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within Very Close of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: Trostani takes three actions: she uses Constrict and Touch of Order, and she casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action.

entries.name: Constrict
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (19)). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Trostani can grapple no more than three targets at a time.

entries.name: Touch of Order
entries.description: Melee Spell Attack: +16 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) radiant damage, and Trostani can choose one magic item she can see in the target's possession. Unless it's an artifact, the item's magic is suppressed until the start of Trostani's next turn.

entries.name: Wrath of Mat'Selesnya (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Trostani conjures a momentary whirl of branches and vines at a point she can see within Far of her. Each creature in a Close cube on that point must make a Agility Reaction Roll (24), taking 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage and 21 (6d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
entries.description: The quori's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save Difficulty (14)). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:At will: charm person1/day: fear

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The quori makes three attacks: one pincer attack, one attack with its claws, and one stinger attack.

entries.name: Pincer
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape Difficulty (14)) if it is a Large or smaller creature. The quori has two pincers, each of which can grapple one target.

entries.name: Claws
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (4d4 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Stinger
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (14) or be frightened of the quori for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
entries.description: One humanoid that the quori can see within Very Close of it must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (14) or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the quori ends it as a bonus action, or the quori is forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the quori reappears in an unoccupied space within Very Close of the body. The target is immune to this quori's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The blight has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the blight's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Aggressive
entries.description: As a bonus action, the cerberus can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

entries.name: Multiheaded
entries.description: The cerberus can't be surprised, and it has advantage on saving throws against being knocked unconscious.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The cerberus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the cerberus's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The cerberus makes two bite attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

entries.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The cerberus exhales a Close cone of molten rock. Each creature in the cone must make a Agility Reaction Roll (12), taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, a creature is also restrained by the hardening rock. A creature can make a Difficulty (12) Strength (Athletics) check as an action, freeing itself or a creature within reach from the rock on a success. The rock has AC 17 and 10 hit points, and it is immune to fire, poison, and psychic damage.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries.description: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries.description: The typhon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The typhon regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The typhon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The typhon makes three attacks: one with its Flurry of Bites, one to constrict, and one with its maw.

entries.name: Flurry of Bites
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 35 (8d6 + 7) piercing damage.

entries.name: Constrict
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach Close, one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (19)). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The typhon can have up to two creatures constricted.

entries.name: Maw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) acid damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tyrannosaurus makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach Very Close. Hit: 33 (4d12 + 7) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (17)). While Grappled, the target has the Restrained condition and can't be targeted by the tyrannosaurus's Tail.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach Close. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Disgorge Zombie
entries.description: As a bonus action, the tyrannosaurus zombie can disgorge a normal zombie, which appears in an unoccupied space within Very Close of it. The disgorged zombie acts on its own initiative count. After a zombie is disgorged, roll a d6. On a roll of 1, the tyrannosaurus zombie runs out of zombies to disgorge and loses this trait. If the tyrannosaurus zombie still has this trait when it dies, 1d4 normal zombies erupt from its corpse at the start of its next turn. These zombies act on their own initiative count.

entries.name: Undead Fortitude
entries.description: If damage reduces the tyrannosaurus zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The tyrannosaurus zombie makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 33 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (17)). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and the tyrannosaurus zombie can't bite another target or disgorge zombies.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Charge
entries.description: If the udaak moves at least Close straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 27 (6d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (21) or be pushed up to Close away from the udaak and knocked prone.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries.description: The udaak deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The udaak makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its slam.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 21 (2d12 + 8) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (21)). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the udaak can't bite another target.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Swallow
entries.description: The udaak makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the udaak, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the udaak's turns.If the udaak takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the udaak must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (21) at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within Very Close of the udaak. If the udaak dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using Close of movement, exiting prone.

entries.name: Creature Sense
entries.description: The ulitharid is aware of the presence of creatures within 2 miles of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher.
