entries.name: All-Around Vision
entries.description: The vlazok can't be surprised.

entries.name: Blood Frenzy
entries.description: The vlazok has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The vlazok has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: The vlazok can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The vlazok makes two Gore attacks.

entries.name: Gore
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the prone condition.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The scavver doesn't require air.

entries.name: Swallowing Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 45 (6d12 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Agility Reaction Roll (16) or be swallowed by the scavver. The scavver can have one creature swallowed at a time.A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the scavver, and takes 11 (2d10) acid damage at the start of each of the scavver's turns from the digestive juices in the scavver's gullet.If the scavver takes 25 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the scavver must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (20) at the end of that turn or regurgitate the swallowed creature, which falls prone in a space within Very Close of the scavver. If the scavver dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using Very Close of movement, exiting prone.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries.description: The vox seeker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

entries.name: Voice Lock
entries.description: The vox seeker must move toward and attack the source of the nearest voice within Far of it, to the exclusion of all other targets, for as long as it remains operational.

entries.name: Pincer
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 3 lightning damage.

entries.name: Demonic Restoration
entries.description: If the vrock dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The vrock has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The vrock makes two Shred attacks.

entries.name: Shred
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.

entries.name: Spores (Recharge 6)
entries.description: Finesse Reaction Roll (15), each creature in a Close Emanation originating from the vrock. Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. While Poisoned, the target takes 5 (1d10) Poison damage at the start of each of its turns. Emptying a flask of Holy Water on the target ends the effect early.

entries.name: Stunning Screech (1/Day)
entries.description: Finesse Reaction Roll (15), each creature in a Close Emanation originating from the vrock (demons succeed automatically). Failure: 10 (3d6) Thunder damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the end of the vrock's next turn.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries.description: Magic can't put the stingblade to sleep.

entries.name: Stingblade
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

entries.name: Boomerang
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, reach Close. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries.description: Magic can't put the priest to sleep.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The priest casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (13), +5 to hit with spell attacks):At will: Dancing Lights, Ray of Sickness, Thaumaturgy1/day each: Cure Wounds, Hold Person, Protection from Poison

entries.name: Venom Staff
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of the priest's next turn.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The vulture has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Beak
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach Very Close. Hit: 2 (1d4) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Violent Death
entries.description: When a corpse is reduced to 0 hit points, it splits open, disgorging a swarm of poisonous snakes. The snakes are hungry and fight until slain.

entries.name: Club
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Crumbling Colossus
entries.description: When the statue drops to 0 hit points, it crumbles and is destroyed. Any creature on the ground within Close of the crumbling statue must make a Agility Reaction Roll (22), taking 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Immutable Form
entries.description: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The statue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries.description: The statue deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The statue makes two melee attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 29 (3d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Hurled Stone
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 43 (6d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries.description: The walrus can hold its breath for 10 minutes.

entries.name: Tusks
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The war priest makes two Maul attacks, and it uses Holy Fire.

entries.name: Maul
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus Hit: 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

entries.name: Holy Fire
entries.description: The war priest targets one creature it can see within Far of it. The target must make a Presence Reaction Roll (15). On a failed save, the target takes 12 (2d8 + 3) radiant damage, and it is blinded until the start of the war priest's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't blinded.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The war priest casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: light, spare the dying, thaumaturgy1/day each: banishment, command, dispel magic, flame strike, guardian of faith, hold person, lesser restoration, revivify

entries.name: Aura of Menace
entries.description: As long as the archon doesn't have the incapacitated condition, each creature of the archon's choice that starts its turn within Close of the archon must make a Presence Reaction Roll (15). On a failed save, the creature has the frightened condition until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to all archons' Aura of Menace for 24 hours.

entries.name: Eternal Vigil
entries.description: The archon can't be surprised. Moreover, it knows when any creature uses a portal it is assigned to guard.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The archon makes two Claw attacks and one Tracker's Bite attack.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the target has the grappled condition (escape Difficulty (18)). The archon can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The archon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)):At will: detect evil and good1/day each: aid, continual flame, protection from evil and good, scrying (as an action)

entries.name: Tracker's Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, for the next 24 hours, the archon knows the distance and direction to the target while they are both on the same plane of existence.

entries.name: Teleport
entries.description: The archon teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within Very Far of itself.

entries.name: Immutable Form
entries.description: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries.description: If the colossus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The colossus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries.description: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Towering Terror
entries.description: Any enemy outside the colossus that starts its turn within Close of it must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (26) or be frightened until the start of the enemy's next turn. If the enemy's saving throw is successful, it is immune to this colossus's Towering Terror for the next 24 hours.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The colossus makes three attacks—one with its slam and two with its eldritch turrets—and then uses Stomp.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 29 (3d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the colossus can push the target up to Close away from it.

entries.name: Eldritch Turret
entries.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +18 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 18 (4d8) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked prone.

entries.name: Stomp
entries.description: The colossus stomps one of its feet at a point on the ground within Close of it. Any creature in a Close-radius, Close-high cylinder centered on this point must succeed on a Agility Reaction Roll (26) or take 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage and fall prone. Until the colossus uses its Stomp again or moves, the creature is restrained. While restrained in this way, the creature (or another creature within Very Close of it) can use its action to make a Difficulty (26) Strength check. On a success, the creature relocates to an unoccupied space of its choice within Very Close of the colossus and is no longer restrained.Structures, as well as nonmagical objects that are neither being worn nor carried, take the same amount of damage if they are in the cylinder (no save).

entries.name: Incinerating Beam (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The colossus fires a beam of light in a Very Far line that is Very Close wide. Each creature in the line must make a Agility Reaction Roll (26), taking 60 (11d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this beam is disintegrated, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

entries.name: Warforged Resilience
entries.description: The warforged has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and is immune to disease. Magic can't put it to sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The warforged makes two armblade attacks.

entries.name: Armblade
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Javelin
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Platforms
entries.description: The warforged titan has two platforms built into its chassis. One Medium or smaller creature can ride on each platform without squeezing. To make a melee attack against a target within Very Close of the warforged, they must use spears or weapons with reach and the target must be Large or larger.

entries.name: Siege Monster
entries.description: The warforged titan deals double damage to objects and structures.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The warforged titan makes one axehand attack and one hammerfist attack.

entries.name: Axehand
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage, plus 11 (2d10) slashing damage if the target is prone.

entries.name: Hammerfist
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (17) or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Sweeping Axe (Recharge 6)
entries.description: The warforged titan makes a sweep with its axehand, and each creature within Very Close of it must make a Agility Reaction Roll (17). A creature takes 19 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The warforged makes two Armblade attacks.

entries.name: Armblade
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Javelin
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Hooves
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the horse moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) Bludgeoning damage and has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Hooves
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the skeleton moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The warlock makes two Rapier attacks, or it uses Bewildering Word twice.

entries.name: Rapier
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

entries.name: Bewildering Word
entries.description: The warlock utters a magical bewilderment, targeting one creature it can see within Far of it. The target must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (14) or take 9 (2d8) psychic damage and have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of the warlock's next turn.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The warlock casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (14)): At will: dancing lights, disguise self, mage armor (self only), mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, speak with animals1/day each: charm person, dimension door, hold monster

entries.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The warlock makes three Scimitar attacks.

entries.name: Scimitar
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

entries.name: Hellfire
entries.description: Green flame explodes in a Very Close-radius sphere centered on a point within Very Far of the warlock. Each creature in that area must make a Agility Reaction Roll (15), taking 16 (3d10) fire damage and 11 (2d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The warlock casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)): At will: alter self, mage armor (self only), mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation1/day each: banishment, plane shift, suggestion

id: Warlock of the Great Old One_teakdpwg8
name: Warlock of the Great Old One

entries.name: Whispering Aura
entries.description: At the start of each of the warlock's turns, each creature of its choice within Very Close of it must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (15) or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage, provided that the warlock isn't incapacitated.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The warlock makes two Dagger attacks.

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

entries.name: Howling Void
entries.description: The warlock opens a momentary extraplanar rift within Far of it. The rift is a scream-filled, Close cube. Each creature in that area must make a Presence Reaction Roll (15). On a failed save, a creature takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage and is frightened of the warlock until the start of the warlock's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't frightened.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The warlock casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (15)): At will: detect magic, guidance, levitate, mage armor (self only), mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation1/day each: arcane gate, detect thoughts, true seeing

entries.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
entries.description: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

entries.name: Survivor
entries.description: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has fewer than half its hit points but at least 1 hit point.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The warlord makes two Greatsword or Short bow attacks.

entries.name: Greatsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

entries.name: Shortbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Battle Readiness
entries.description: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

entries.name: Improved Critical
entries.description: The warrior's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

entries.name: Improved Defense
entries.description: The warrior's AC increases by 1.

entries.name: Indomitable (1/Day)
entries.description: The warrior can reroll a saving throw that it fails, but it must use the new result.

entries.name: Martial Role
entries.description: The warrior has one of the following traits of your choice:Attacker. The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.Defender. The warrior gains the Protection reaction below.

entries.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: The warrior can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + its level.

entries.name: Extra Attack
entries.description: The warrior can attack three times, instead of once, whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Martial Role
entries.description: The warrior has one of the following traits of your choice:Attacker. The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.Defender. The warrior gains the Protection reaction below.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

entries.name: Battle Readiness
entries.description: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

entries.name: Improved Critical
entries.description: The warrior's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

entries.name: Indomitable (1/Day)
entries.description: The warrior can reroll a saving throw that it fails, but it must use the new result.

entries.name: Martial Role
entries.description: The warrior has one of the following traits of your choice:Attacker. The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.Defender. The warrior gains the Protection reaction below.

entries.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: The warrior can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + its level.

entries.name: Extra Attack
entries.description: The warrior can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Battle Readiness
entries.description: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

entries.name: Improved Critical
entries.description: The warrior's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

entries.name: Martial Role
entries.description: The warrior has one of the following traits of your choice:Attacker. The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.Defender. The warrior gains the Protection reaction below.

entries.name: Extra Attack
entries.description: The warrior can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The warrior makes three attacks, using Greatsword or Longbow in any combination.

entries.name: Greatsword
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach Very Close. Hit: 19 (4d6 + 5) Slashing damage. The warrior also creates one of the following effects:Sap. The target has Disadvantage on its next attack roll before the start of the warrior's next turn.Maneuver. One ally who can see or hear the warrior can take a Reaction to move up to half the ally's Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +9, range Very Far. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) Piercing damage, and the target's Speed decreases by Very Close until the end of the target's next turn.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The warrior has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Spear
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +3, reach Very Close or range Close. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The warrior makes two Greatsword or Heavy Crossbow attacks.

entries.name: Greatsword
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +3, range Far. Hit: 12 (2d10 + 1) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Spear
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

entries.name: Flyby
entries.description: The dragonnel doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The dragonnel makes two Rend attacks.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Acid Spit
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 20 (5d6 + 3) acid damage.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries.description: The wastrilith can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Corrupt Water
entries.description: At the start of each of the wastrilith's turns, exposed water within Close of it is befouled. Underwater, this effect lightly obscures the area until a current clears it away. Water in containers remains corrupted until it evaporates.A creature that consumes this foul water or swims in it must make a Finesse Reaction Roll (18). On a successful save, the creature is immune to the foul water for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. At the end of this time, the poisoned creature must repeat the saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 18 (4d8) poison damage and is poisoned until it finishes a long rest.If another demon drinks the foul water as an action, it gains 11 (2d10) temporary hit points.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The wastrilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The wastrilith makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks, and it uses Grasping Spout.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 30 (4d12 + 4) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claws
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Grasping Spout
entries.description: The wastrilith magically launches a spout of water at one creature it can see within Far of it. The target must make a Strength Reaction Roll (17), and it has disadvantage if it's underwater. On a failed save, it takes 22 (4d8 + 4) acid damage and is pulled up to Far toward the wastrilith. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.

entries.name: Freeze
entries.description: If the elemental takes Cold damage, its Speed decreases by Close until the end of its next turn.

entries.name: Water Form
entries.description: The elemental can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The elemental makes two Slam attacks.

entries.name: Slam
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Whelm (Recharge 4–6)
entries.description: Strength Reaction Roll (15), each creature in the elemental's space. Failure: 22 (4d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (14)). Until the grapple ends, the target has the Restrained condition, is suffocating unless it can breathe water, and takes 9 (2d8) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the elemental's turns. The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at a time with Whelm. As an action, a creature within Very Close of the elemental can pull a creature out of it by succeeding on a Difficulty (14) Strength (Athletics) check. Success: Half damage only.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The myrmidon makes three Trident attacks.

entries.name: Trident
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) force damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) force damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

entries.name: Freezing Strikes (Recharge 6)
entries.description: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) cold damage. A target that is hit by one or more of these attacks has its speed reduced by Very Close until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

entries.name: Invisible in Water
entries.description: The water weird has the Invisible condition while fully immersed in water.

entries.name: Water Bound
entries.description: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

entries.name: Surge
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Cold damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape Difficulty (13)), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 1 Piercing damage.

entries.name: Shapechanger
entries.description: The werebat can use its action to polymorph into a Medium bat-humanoid hybrid, or into a Large giant bat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

entries.name: Keen Hearing
entries.description: The werebat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries.description: While in sunlight, the werebat has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

entries.name: Echolocation (Bat or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: The werebat has blindsight out to a range of Far as long as it's not deafened.

entries.name: Nimble Escape (Humanoid Form Only)
entries.description: The werebat can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

entries.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: In humanoid form, the werebat makes two scimitar attacks or two shortbow attacks. In hybrid form, it can make one bite attack and one scimitar attack.

entries.name: Bite (Bat or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the werebat gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (10) or be cursed with werebat lycanthropy.

entries.name: Scimitar (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Shortbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The werebear makes two attacks, using Handaxe or Rend in any combination. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

entries.name: Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. Finesse Reaction Roll (14). Failure: The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a Werebear under the DM's control and has 10 Hit Points. Success: The target is immune to this werebear's curse for 24 hours.

entries.name: Handaxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close or range Close. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Rend (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The wereboar makes two attacks, using Javelin or Tusk in any combination. It can replace one attack with a Gore attack.

entries.name: Gore (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. Finesse Reaction Roll (12). Failure: The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a Wereboar under the DM's control and has 10 Hit Points. Success: The target is immune to this wereboar's curse for 24 hours.

entries.name: Javelin (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close or range Close. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Tusk (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature and the wereboar moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) Piercing damage and has the Prone condition.

entries.name: Shapechanger
entries.description: The werejaguar can use its action to polymorph into a jaguar-humanoid hybrid or into a jaguar, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

entries.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries.description: The werejaguar has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

entries.name: Pounce (Jaguar or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: If the werejaguar moves at least Close straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (14) or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the werejaguar can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

entries.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: In humanoid form, the werejaguar makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks. In hybrid form, it can attack like a humanoid or make two claw attacks.

entries.name: Bite (Jaguar or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (13) or be cursed with werejaguar lycanthropy.

entries.name: Claw (Jaguar or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Scimitar (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The wererat makes two attacks, using Scratch or Hand Crossbow in any combination. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

entries.name: Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. Finesse Reaction Roll (11). Failure: The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a Wererat under the DM's control and has 10 Hit Points. Success: The target is immune to this wererat's curse for 24 hours.

entries.name: Scratch
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range Close. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Shapechanger
entries.description: The wereraven can use its action to polymorph into a raven-humanoid hybrid or into a raven, or back into its human form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its human form if it dies.

entries.name: Mimicry
entries.description: The wereraven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Difficulty (10) Wisdom (Insight) check.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The wereraven regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the wereraven takes damage from a silvered weapon or a spell, this trait doesn't function at the start of the wereraven's next turn. The wereraven dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Multiattack (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: The wereraven makes two weapon attacks, one of which can be with its hand crossbow.

entries.name: Beak (Raven or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage in raven form, or 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage in hybrid form. If the target is humanoid, it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (10) or be cursed with wereraven lycanthropy.

entries.name: Shortsword (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Hand Crossbow (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The weretiger makes two attacks, using Scratch or Longbow in any combination. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

entries.name: Bite (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. Finesse Reaction Roll (13). Failure: The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a Weretiger under the DM's control and has 10 Hit Points. Success: The target is immune to this weretiger's curse for 24 hours.

entries.name: Scratch
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range Very Far. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Regeneration
entries.description: The werevulture regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the werevulture takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the werevulture's next turn. The werevulture dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The werevulture makes two Talon attacks, or it makes a Beak attack and a Talon attack.

entries.name: Beak (Vulture or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (13) or be cursed until targeted by the Remove Curse spell or a similar effect. If the cursed target drops to 0 hit points, it becomes a werevulture under the DM's control and regains 10 hit points.

entries.name: Talon
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 13 (4d4 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The werewolf has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the werewolf's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The werewolf makes two attacks, using Scratch or Longbow in any combination. It can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

entries.name: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. Finesse Reaction Roll (12). Failure: The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a Werewolf under the DM's control and has 10 Hit Points. Success: The target is immune to this werewolf's curse for 24 hours.

entries.name: Scratch
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range Very Far. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Flyby (Wyvern or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: The werewyvern doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack action when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The werewyvern makes three attacks, using Javelin or Rend in any combination. It can replace one of these attacks with one Stinger attack.

entries.name: Javelin (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close or range Close. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

entries.name: Stinger (Wyvern or Hybrid Form Only)
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach Very Close. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the werewyvern's next turn. If the target is a Humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect. Finesse Reaction Roll (16). Failure: The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a Werewyvern under the DM's control and has 20 Hit Points. Success: The target is immune to this werewyvern's curse for 24 hours.

entries.name: False Appearance
entries.description: If the chandelier is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the chandelier move or act, that creature must succeed on a Difficulty (18) Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the chandelier is animate.

entries.name: Fiery Aura
entries.description: Any creature that starts its turn within Very Close of the chandelier takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The chandelier makes three Chain attacks, three Lamp attacks, or a combination thereof.

entries.name: Chain
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (15) or be pulled into an unoccupied space within Very Close of the chandelier.

entries.name: Lamp
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) fire damage.

entries.name: Blazing Vortex (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Each creature within Close of the chandelier and not behind total cover must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (14) or take 36 (8d8) fire damage and have the blinded condition until the start of the chandelier's next turn.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries.description: The whirlwyrm can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The whirlwyrm makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape Difficulty (16)). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the whirlwyrm can't bite another target.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one target not grappled by the whirlwyrm. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (16) or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Blurred Form
entries.description: Attack rolls against the whistler are made with disadvantage unless the whistler is incapacitated.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The whistler doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The whistler makes three Psychic Swipe attacks.

entries.name: Psychic Swipe
entries.description: Melee Spell Attack: +8 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage.

entries.name: Otherworldly Melody (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The whistler telepathically whistles an otherworldly melody into the minds of up to two creatures it can see within range of its telepathy. Each target must succeed on a Presence Reaction Roll (16) or take 33 (6d10) psychic damage and become frightened of the whistler for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Devil's Sight
entries.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Reckless
entries.description: At the start of its turn, the abishai can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The abishai makes one Bite attack, one Claw attack, and one Longsword attack.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage if used with two hands.

entries.name: Ice Walk
entries.description: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, Difficult Terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

entries.name: Rend
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Cold damage.

entries.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Finesse Reaction Roll (12), each creature in a Close Cone. Failure: 22 (5d8) Cold damage. Success: Half damage.

name: White Greatwyrm

entries.name: Chromatic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries.description: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 425 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 105,000 XP (210,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Chromatic Awakening activates.

entries.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries.description: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

entries.name: Unusual Nature
entries.description: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) force damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (20)) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

entries.name: Tail
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach Close, one target. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (26) or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: The greatwyrm exhales a blast of energy in a Very Far cone. Each creature in that area must make a Agility Reaction Roll (26). On a failed save, the creature takes 78 (12d12) cold damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

original_cr: 27 (XP 105,000, or 210,000 as a mythic encounter; PB +8)

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries.description: While in sunlight, the wight has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The wight makes two attacks, using Necrotic Sword or Necrotic Bow in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Life Drain.

entries.name: Necrotic Sword
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

entries.name: Necrotic Bow
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range Very Far. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

entries.name: Life Drain
entries.description: Finesse Reaction Roll (13), one creature within Very Close. Failure: 6 (1d8 + 2) Necrotic damage, and the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.A Humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a Zombie under the wight's control, unless the Humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at a time.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries.description: While in sunlight, the wight has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The wight makes two attacks, using Necrotic Sword or Necrotic Bow in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Drink Life.

entries.name: Necrotic Sword
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

entries.name: Necrotic Bow
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range Very Far. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage.

entries.name: Drink Life (Recharge 5–6)
entries.description: Finesse Reaction Roll (13), one creature within Very Close. Failure: 6 (1d8 + 2) Necrotic damage, and the wight regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Necrotic damage taken.

entries.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries.description: The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The dog has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dog's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.

entries.name: Flame Seed
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, range Far, one target you can see. Hit: 1d6 + PB fire damage.

entries.name: Fiery Teleportation
entries.description: The spirit and each willing creature of your choice within Very Close of it teleport up to Close to unoccupied spaces you can see. Then each creature within Very Close of the space that the spirit left must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC or take 1d6 + PB fire damage.

entries.name: Consume Life
entries.description: As a bonus action, the will-o'-wells can target one creature it can see within Very Close of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a Finesse Reaction Roll (10) against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wells regains 10 (3d6) hit points.

entries.name: Ephemeral
entries.description: The will-o'-wells can't wear or carry anything.

entries.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries.description: The will-o'-wells can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

entries.name: Variable Illumination
entries.description: The will-o'-wells sheds bright light in a 5 to Close radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wells can alter the radius as a bonus action.

entries.name: Shock
entries.description: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

entries.name: Invisibility
entries.description: The will-o'-wells and its light magically become invisible until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

entries.name: Magic Boon (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries.description: The will-o'-wells grants a boon to one creature it can see within Very Close of it that isn't an Undead. The boon's recipient gains a d4 and can, at any time within the next 24 hours, roll this die and add the number rolled to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw made by it. No creature can have more than one of these magic boons at a time.

entries.name: Ephemeral
entries.description: The wisp can't wear or carry anything.

entries.name: Illumination
entries.description: The wisp sheds Bright Light in a Close radius and Dim Light for an additional Close.

entries.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries.description: The wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

entries.name: Shock
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach Very Close. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) Lightning damage.

entries.name: Invisible in Water
entries.description: The wine weird is invisible while fully immersed in water.

entries.name: Water Bound
entries.description: The wine weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

entries.name: Constrict
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach Very Close, one creature. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape Difficulty (13)) and pulled Very Close toward the wine weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the wine weird tries to drown it, and the wine weird can't constrict another target.

entries.name: Charge
entries.description: If the bull moves at least Close straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 19 (3d12) piercing damage.

entries.name: Gore
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The kobold has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries.description: While in sunlight, the kobold has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

entries.name: Dragon-Tooth Blade
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach Very Close. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

entries.name: Chromatic Spittle
entries.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range Close. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) damage of a type chosen by the kobold: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison.

entries.name: Pounce
entries.description: If the lion moves at least Close straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a Strength Reaction Roll (15) or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

entries.name: Claw
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

entries.name: Claws
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

entries.name: Rock
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range Close, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries.description: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Sorrowful Presence
entries.description: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within Far of the eladrin must make a Presence Reaction Roll (13). On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Sorrowful Presence for the next 24 hours.Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, the charmed creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Multiattack
entries.description: The eladrin makes two Longsword or Longbow attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) slashing damage, or 5 (1d10) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range Very Far, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) cold damage.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The eladrin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save Difficulty (16)):At will: fog cloud, gust of wind, sleet storm

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries.description: The wolf has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within Very Close of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

entries.name: Bite
entries.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach Very Close. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

entries.description: Finesse Reaction Roll (12), each creature in a Close Cone. Failure: 18 (4d8) Cold damage. Success: Half damage.

entries.name: Secret Expertise
entries.description: The hand has one of these additional skills: Acrobatics +6, Animal Handling +5, Arcana +5, Athletics +4, Medicine +5, or Performance +5.

entries.name: Dagger
entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.name: Pixie Dust (1/Day)
entries.description: The hand sprinkles a pinch of pixie dust on itself or another creature it can see within Very Close of it. The recipient gains a flying speed of Close for 1 minute. If the creature is airborne when this effect ends, it falls safely to the ground, taking no damage and landing on its feet.

entries.name: Spellcasting
entries.description: The hand casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability:At will: dancing lights, message, prestidigitation

entries.name: Secret Expertise
entries.description: The hand has one of these additional skills: Acrobatics +6, Animal Handling +5, Arcana +5, Athletics +4, Medicine +5, or Performance +5.

entries.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach Very Close or range Close, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

entries.description: The hand sprinkles a pinch of pixie dust on itself or another creature it can see within Very Close of it. The recipient gains a flying speed of Close for 1 minute. If the creature is airborne when this effect ends, it falls safely to the ground, taking no damage and landing on its feet.
